story:
In my seven years as an oncology (cancer) massage therapist, I have witnessed the cancer journey through the eyes of thousands of amazing courageous souls, those who have beaten cancer and those who have lost their battle.

My name is Catherine Tatum. Six years ago as I was treating a patient, I felt as though God stuck a USB cable into my mind and downloaded this book into my heart. God then sent numerous earth angels and messengers to tell me their stories and speak from their hearts. 

It has recently been pressed upon me that the time to share this gift I have been given is NOW.

For the people who are led to this book, my hope is that they find healing, hope, joy and inspiration on the pages to help them navigate whatever challenges they may be facing. They also need to know that they are not alone in their journey.

My other hope is that Touching Cancer can lead readers down the path to health and healing through the research I have been guided to explore and share.

Although Touching Cancer is inspired by the stories of cancer patients, their stories are universal to the human spirit when facing the trials of life, whatever those may be. 

At present the book is about two thirds or more complete. This campaign will allow me to self-publish the book (including one-on-one writing mentoring, editing, graphic design and printing) without involving a traditional publisher. It will also give me the ability to market the book effectively to share these insights to give people in all situations, healing, hope and inspiration. The planned launch date is May 2018.

Bonus Perks

Everyone who helps fund this project will get the perk they choose as well as weekly insights into the campaign, the table of contents and progress of the book until launch. I will also be asking my backers to vote in a book cover contest to help choose the artwork. The book cover I present now is simply a mock up. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with the book has been getting this far. I am certain that this book will be finished by spring next year. I have researched the resources for the completion and have them already lined up. As I stated above, I will be sending updates about the book weekly.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of any organizations or groups that might be interested in helping my campaign and you do not have time to contact them, please drop me a line and I will contact them myself.

If you can think of a perk you are interested in backing and you do not see it to the right, please let me know and we can work that out. If you are not interested in the perks and just want to support me you can click the BACK IT button above.

I am well aware that financial backing is not possible for everyone and I completely understand and there are other ways to support me.

  • Please share this campaign with everyone you know. Tell them about this book and the difference that it can make in peoples lives.
  • You can use the Indigogo share tools that make it easier.
  • I must apologize but at this time this campaign is only available in the United States due to banking policies. Please email me if you are outside of the United States and would like to purchase a copy of the book when it is completed in 2018.

Thank you so much for taking the time to consider my book. May God Bless You.

story:
Short Summary

My daughter Naomi and I are very excited to again be a part of a mission trip to Haiti with a team from Santa Cruz Bible Church. Our experience last year was life changing in ways that are difficult to express. In addition to being the poorest nation in the Western Hemisphere, Haiti is still suffering from the devastating earthquake of 2010, so suffice it to say, much work remains to be done. 

On our last trip there, we were able to work alongside the locals on multiple projects including painting university dorm rooms, pouring cement floors, vacation Bible schools (impacting over 900 local children) and so much more.  In addition to those projects, this year we will be holding a health/hygiene day for children and will distribute toothbrushes, toothpaste, soap and washcloths, and flip flops or shoes.

Please share this experience with us through your prayers and/or financial support.

The above video (music by Matisyahu) was put together by Esther Witmer Sims, my precious daughter, who was on last year's team with Naomi and me.  I hope it gives you a little glimpse into the experiences we had while in Haiti.

story:
A children's book about Nietzsche may not seem like a perfect match, but to me, his philosophies feel rooted in a child's sense of nature and life. Simple, at times brutal, but filled with the opportunity to create Earth-altering change with just the will to do so.

This book is my attempt to visualize a handful of Nietzsche’s concepts through paper art, inspired by the work of Russian avant-garde artist Aleksei Kruchenykh. The illustrations act as visual cues for the ideas, while the text enhances their meaning.


If I sound earnest, it's because I am. This book was initially created as an artistic exercise and evolved into a two-year-long project to make this book. I hope it amuses children and adults alike.

Your contributions go toward the printing of the book. 

Thank you for your support!

Oh, and here's my poem dedicated to Nietzsche's moustache, which I made into a jumbo bookmark.

story:
Short Summary

Hey! I'm Rabbi Lawrence. Originally from London, England, I moved to New York 18 years ago. I'm the educational director of the Jewish Enrichment Center running programs for Birthright Israel Alumni in NYC and I'm on full time faculty at Stern College for Women. 

For the past 15 years I have worked with young Jewish men and women in their 20's and 30's in NYC. I teach classes, run programs, I've lead over twenty five trips to Israel and Poland. As you can imagine working with this age group places most of my time dealing with questions on dating, love, relationships and marriage. I've set up many marriages myself, and performed over ninety weddings!

Since I started working I've kept a journal of thoughts, ideas, advice and stories from the hundreds of young couples I've counseled over the years, and the many relationship presentations I have given across the country. Well, I've finally got around to writing a book about it! 

I really want to bring this incredible book into reality and I need your help.

My last book campaign "Jew Got Questions?" was an incredible success. that I was asked to write another book. Without you, the supporters, my last book would never have happened, and neither will this one. So I need your incredible support!

What I Need & What You Get

The money I raise from this campaign will be used for all the editing, cover design, marketing, and advertising of the book. I already have an editor waiting to begin working on the book. She has worked with top authors in the US and is very excited about being involved with this project. 

For $36 you will receive a personally signed copy of the book delivered to your door. You will also have the satisfaction of knowing that this project would never have happened with your invaluable help.

Your Name in Print!

Have you ever been mentioned in a book before? This is you chance! For only $100 you will receive a personally signed copy of the book, and when you open the book, you will see your name printed inside! Show that to your friends, family and one day your kids!

Phone or Online Meeting

For $500 I would be delighted to meet with you for a one-on-one session. You can make your way to my Manhattan center on 13th street. If you are not able to do that we can set a phone, Skype or Facetime meeting to discuss any topic of your choice.

Let Me Meet Your Community

For $1500 I will visit your community and give a presentation and for $5000 I'll stay for Shabbat and speak as many times as you want.

If for some tragic reason I don't reach my goal, this book will still happen! I've already invested much time and money into making this happen, so I'm not going to stop now!

The Impact

I know the incredible impact this book can have, from the feedback from my last Indiegogo campaign that was a runaway success. The book was written, published and in the ten months since its release has sold 4000 copies. I have received emails from people all over the world telling me how much this book impacted them and their friends too. Many people bought two or more books just to hand out.

This book will be bigger and even better, focusing on what many people are thinking about: love, dating, relationships and marriage.

You may be single or I'm sure you have single family, friends and loved ones. Singles are searching online, at events and anywhere to find their life partner. This book will really help you look in the right place, and have the right frame of mind to know what to focus on and what to move on from.

I feel passionately about this project and I hope you will too.

Risks & Challenges

I know from my first book the incredible challenge writing a book can be. It takes time, money and above all great commitment. However with the right support staff I know I can make this book as great a success if not more that my first book.

I have lined up the best editors, designers and marketing experts who are have incredible experience in making books just like mine a success.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, or even if you did ;) please share this campaign on your twitter, Facebook or any other social media you are involved in. Talk about it to friends, mention it to your mother (she'll love it I promise!)

story:
Money...

Probably the most confusing, provocative and compelling subject in the world.  

How to create it, what makes us lose it, the reason we envy (and sometimes hate) those who have it, and why everyone longs to be rich...

Why Prosperity?

Chasing money can be a sad, shallow and fearful existence!  Plus we are all taught at school that you have to 'work hard' to make money.

But in my experience, manifesting Prosperity is about creating a life of joyful service, flow and abundance where everything you desire magically  and effortlessly shows up.  

Let me show you how to never have to 'work' again.

50 years' experience

Recently I realised that I had been given the perfect life to experience everything I needed to become an authority on Prosperity.  Growing up above my Dad's shop, 7 years' training in accountancy, creating a £multi-million turnover market leading business at the age of 24 and losing it at the age of 40 followed by personal bankruptcy then building up my wealth again from nothing. 

Inspiring, motivating and empowering thousands through my books, online products, seminars, workshops, speaking and mentoring and along the way learning from some of the greatest thought leaders of our time.  

Experiencing the light and dark side of wealth creation.  Understanding that money is just a flow of energy.  Realising that healing your relationship with money is absolutely key to the amount that you can manifest.

In this book I will share ALL of those learnings and teachings.

Source Publishing

All funds raised from this campaign are going in to SourceTV - the company I co-created with Hollywood based business shaman Kevin Stein back in 2013.  

'Prosperity' will be the first of many titles we will publish from the emerging Thought Leaders, Transformational Teachers and Evolutionaries within the Source tribe who are committed to raising the consciousness of humanity. 

Vote YES with a pledge

If you'd like to see "Prosperity" in print please do back this campaign.  

If I've ever assisted you, inspired you, helped you or enhanced your life in any way I humbly ask you to now please return the favour.

Provided we receive at least £12,000 in backing the book will go to print and be launched on Wednesday 9 March 2016.  You can even pledge to get VIP tickets to the London launch event!

Plus everyone who backs the campaign will receive a credit + their website address published in the book.  ALSO everyone who pledges for one of the higher value rewards will automatically get a signed limited edition hardback copy of the book.

In deep gratitude for your support,


Rachel x

Rachel Elnaugh

Entrepreneur, former 'Dragon', Business Speaker, Author, Mentor, and Co-Creator SourceTV

story:
WHAT IS GARY & A BOX OF SALT?

More and more children are becoming self-centered, an attitude diametrically opposing team spirit. To help combat that disjointing attitude, this book is a must read for today's youth! Gary & a Box of Salt is an autobiographical narrative of an event based on a young boy, with a loving heart, that gave a box of salt to help feed the poor within his community. This book brings to life the subject of altruism coupled with the compassion to give. 

       Can you remember back in the day when life was much simpler than it is now? Eating home-grown fruits and vegetables, playing out-of-doors, and working and teaming up together in the community to help meet each others daily needs ‒‒that was what we did, and it was common practice! Today, the word “team” is a

When I walked into the pantry the shelves would have been completely bare, if not for a lonely box of salt, that's all that was there!

highly effective business term used by major companies; but now, unfortunately, used less by families. In publishing Gary & a Box of Salt, I’m going old school! Through my warm and insightful book, I’m attempting to bring back the functionality of teamwork in families and community and to reveal the necessity and importance of reestablishing it in the lives of today’s children.

       Often, the first step toward self-help begins by helping someone else, an insight and behavior that should start at home. Children will discover within this delightful picture book just how Gary and his entire family benefited from his enthusiastic act

They gave the box to my mother. "Is that a poor family's box of food," I wondered? I did not think that my family was looked upon as being poor...

of kindness when he donated a box of salt to help feed the poor! Within this book, children will find various life scenarios showing them realistic and attainable outcomes from positive goal setting. Adults will appreciate it as a transitional ice-breaking tool, making it easier to engage youngsters in constructive dialog about the benefits of making good life choices based on topics found within it---And that one point alone substantiates why every parent needs to own at least two copies of this book…Your friends will want to take a copy home with them.

My brother's, sister's, and I often worked in the garden by digging, planting seeds, watering, and pulling weed.

WHO IS GARY V. LETT?

Hello, I am Gary V. Lett. I am currently a working ceramic artist and sculpture. I teach at the American Museum of Ceramic Art (AMOCA) located in Pomona, and at Foothill Country Day School in Claremont, California.  I reside in Pomona with Lisha, my wife of 36 years. We have two adult sons and six grandchildren. I spent over 25 years working in the graphic art field and as the principal of Lett’s Do Art, a graphic art firm; directed and taught art for various children art programs in San Antonio, Texas, and I am a licensed minister. And now I am embarking on my very first published children’s book.

THE CAMPAIGN: It has taken me decades to get where I am today with this project, writing and illustrating a little here and there. This book promotes compassion, healthy eating, exercise, family, and community. The publishing of this book is a grand milestone for my family and me! Over the course of my wonderful marriage, career, and other endeavors, this one experience, in comparison, pales many of the others. For me to finally hold and smell a freshly printed copy of Gary & a Box of Salt will be like holding my first-born all over again.

YOUR GIVING KEEPS ON GIVING: Charity starts at home. Lisha and I have cared and extend ourselves to others even in our youth, and we probably will always continue to do so on into our golden age! Therefore, in traditional form, we want to help others as we help ourselves. Here are two wonderful charities that will benefit from the sale of this book: Justin Carr Wants World Peace Memorial Fund & The Friends of Pomona Public Library. For every book sold, $1 will go to each organization.

Justin Carr Wants World Peace Memorial Fund: The fund is committed to the promotion of world peace through advocacy, art, education, mentoring, and scholarships.

The Friends of Pomona Public Library. The Friends of Pomona Public Library was founded in 1955 in order to promote the continuation of the library as endowed by Andrew Carnegie. He saw that libraries are an integral part of a community’s growth and well-being.

The Friends of Pomona Public Library contributes yearly to library programs and services not budgeted by city funds. Every area of the library has benefited from numerous Friends’ donations, which:

· 2,500 11"x 8.5"thirty-six-page hardcover book with thirtyfour full-clor pages.

·  Sales promotion expenses (projected book-signing trips, advertisements, etc.)

·  International shipping cost

·  ISBN numbers

OUR FUNDING NEEDS AND WHAT YOU GET

Funding goal: $10.000

Perks/gifts: Four levels of “Gifts” for your generous contribution:

Level I  For your support of $70 you will receive: (1) autographed copy of the book Gary & a Box of Salt  and (1) autographed T-shirt that features the book cover and the slogan: "I Helped CrowdFund: Gary & a Box of Salt 2015"

Level II  For your support of $125 you will receive: In addition to Level I: (1) 18”x 24” signed special edition original graphite lithograph, To Positive Roots (unframed), and Gary’s first ever reproduced art work,

Level IIIFor your support of $250 you will receive: In addition to Levels I & II: (1) box of 24 special-edition writing cards and envelopes that features the Positive Roots lithograph and the slogan on the back that reads: "I Helped CrowdFund Gary & a Box of Salt 2015. 

Level IV  For your support of $500 you will receive All Levels Doubled

YOUR DOLLARS WILL BE INFLUENTIAL TO CHANGE 2,500 YOUNG LIVES Plus

All funds raised will go toward printing cost, shipping, and Indiegogo fees associated with this campaign, along with the costs of your perks. The majority of the funding will go directly to producing a high-quality book and the remainder used for perks, marketing, and promotion.

Risks & Challenges

The book is ready to go to the printer; all we need are your funds to make that happen. I can send the order right after being funded. Production of the book will take 4-8 weeks but as with any publishing project there can be unforeseen delays or setbacks. We will work our hardest to get this book and perks into your hands on time and keep everyone updated if there are any setbacks to our estimated schedule. 

What else can you do to help?

The best thing you can do to help us out is to share our campaign! Tell your friends and neighbors and share the campaign through your social media platforms. We appreciate every single share and tweet from the top to the bottom of our hearts! 

My dream for this project may have been deferred, but it has never dried up!

When I was in the sixth grade I won a writing contest. If that win was just based on my illustrations alone, my accomplishment would not have been a big deal. But it truly was! That win came from a kid whose English skills were in the lowest percentile of his sixth-grade class. Creativity has never been an issue for me. But I thank God for a good teacher who used her personal treasure of time and worked with me long hours after school until my sentence structure matched my illustration ability, and it paid off!

Lisha’s and my dream of seeing this book materialize have been ours for years, decades even! I know that deep down inside, ever since that food give-away—the main plot of the book, I’ve wanted to share this story, but because of the lack of finance along with publishers not wanting to pay for 34 color illustrations, those things have kept this book from happening until now! As reality unfolds, and more often than not, achieving success requires the following: great leaps of faith, initiative exercised, and tenacity. These coupled with the right opportunity leads to destiny realized, but let me not leave out the power and benefit of prayer!

The establishing of this printing campaign simulates the scenario of my six-grade book contest and smacks me right back to it. The writing, editing, and illustrations for this book ‒I have done‒ but what I lack right now is money! Today, you sit where that beloved teacher once sat: in the seat of power and where you, too, can make a difference in my life; that of a 59-year-old man whose dream has been deferred, but not dried up! With your dollars, I am closer to living out that dream of seeing Gary & a Box of Salt  in print form and in stores within a matter of months.

The printing of this book will be a great accomplishment for us all. Won’t you please help by sending in your money today? Thank you! If you like my story and would help but are lacking in finance, rest assured, you can still help and be on our team! Just use your influence with your social media network partners and let people know about my Indiegogo page and ask them to support for my campaign. Remember, no gift is too small; every dollar given gets us closer to our maximum goal, and together, we can do this!

       Can you remember back in the day when life was much simpler than it is now? Eating home-grown fruits and vegetables, playing out-of-doors, and working and teaming up together in the community to help meet each others daily needs ‒‒that was what we did, and it was common practice! Today, the word “team” is a
When I walked into the pantry the shelves would have been completely bare, if not for a lonely box of salt, that's all that was there!
highly effective business term used by major companies; but now, unfortunately, used less by families. In publishing Gary & a Box of Salt, I’m going old school! Through my warm and insightful book, I’m attempting to bring back the functionality of teamwork in families and community and to reveal the necessity and importance of reestablishing it in the lives of today’s children. 
       Often, the first step toward self-help begins by helping someone else, an insight and behavior that should start at home. Children will discover within this delightful picture book just how Gary and his entire family benefited from his enthusiastic act

They gave the box to my mother. "Is that a poor family's box of food," I wondered? I did not think that my family was looked upon as being poor...of kindness when he donated a box of salt to help feed the poor! Within this book, children will find various life scenarios showing them realistic and attainable outcomes from positive goal setting. Adults will appreciate it as a transitional ice-breaking tool, making it easier to engage youngsters in constructive dialog about the benefits of making good life choices based on topics found within it---And that one point alone substantiates why every parent needs to own at least two copies of this book…Your friends will want to take a copy home with them. 







My brother's, sister's, and I often worked in the garden by digging, planting seeds, watering, and pulling weed.
WHO IS GARY V. LETT?
Hello, I am Gary V. Lett. I am currently a working ceramic artist and sculpture. I teach at the American Museum of Ceramic Art (AMOCA) located in Pomona, and at Foothill Country Day School in Claremont, California.  I reside in Pomona with Lisha, my wife of 36 years. We have two adult sons and six grandchildren. I spent over 25 years working in the graphic art field and as the principal of Lett’s Do Art, a graphic art firm; directed and taught art for various children art programs in San Antonio, Texas, and I am a licensed minister. And now I am embarking on my very first published children’s book.
THE CAMPAIGN: It has taken me decades to get where I am today with this project, writing and illustrating a little here and there. This book promotes compassion, healthy eating, exercise, family, and community. The publishing of this book is a grand milestone for my family and me! Over the course of my wonderful marriage, career, and other endeavors, this one experience, in comparison, pales many of the others. For me to finally hold and smell a freshly printed copy of Gary & a Box of Salt will be like holding my first-born all over again.

YOUR GIVING KEEPS ON GIVING: Charity starts at home. Lisha and I have cared and extend ourselves to others even in our youth, and we probably will always continue to do so on into our golden age! Therefore, in traditional form, we want to help others as we help ourselves. Here are two wonderful charities that will benefit from the sale of this book: Justin Carr Wants World Peace Memorial Fund & The Friends of Pomona Public Library. For every book sold, $1 will go to each organization.
Justin Carr Wants World Peace Memorial Fund: The fund is committed to the promotion of world peace through advocacy, art, education, mentoring, and scholarships.
The Friends of Pomona Public Library. The Friends of Pomona Public Library was founded in 1955 in order to promote the continuation of the library as endowed by Andrew Carnegie. He saw that libraries are an integral part of a community’s growth and well-being.The Friends of Pomona Public Library contributes yearly to library programs and services not budgeted by city funds. Every area of the library has benefited from numerous Friends’ donations, which:
· 2,500 11"x 8.5"thirty-six-page hardcover book with thirtyfour full-clor pages.
·  Sales promotion expenses (projected book-signing trips, advertisements, etc.) 
·  International shipping cost
·  ISBN numbers

OUR FUNDING NEEDS AND WHAT YOU GET
Funding goal: $10.000
 Perks/gifts: Four levels of “Gifts” for your generous contribution:
Level I  For your support of $70 you will receive: (1) autographed copy of the book Gary & a Box of Salt  and (1) autographed T-shirt that features the book cover and the slogan: "I Helped CrowdFund: Gary & a Box of Salt 2015"

Level II  For your support of $125 you will receive: In addition to Level I: (1) 18”x 24” signed special edition original graphite lithograph, To Positive Roots (unframed), and Gary’s first ever reproduced art work, 
Level IIIFor your support of $250 you will receive: In addition to Levels I & II: (1) box of 24 special-edition writing cards and envelopes that features the Positive Roots lithograph and the slogan on the back that reads: "I Helped CrowdFund Gary & a Box of Salt 2015. 

Level IV  For your support of $500 you will receive All Levels Doubled 

YOUR DOLLARS WILL BE INFLUENTIAL TO CHANGE 2,500 YOUNG LIVES Plus
All funds raised will go toward printing cost, shipping, and Indiegogo fees associated with this campaign, along with the costs of your perks. The majority of the funding will go directly to producing a high-quality book and the remainder used for perks, marketing, and promotion.
Risks & Challenges
The book is ready to go to the printer; all we need are your funds to make that happen. I can send the order right after being funded. Production of the book will take 4-8 weeks but as with any publishing project there can be unforeseen delays or setbacks. We will work our hardest to get this book and perks into your hands on time and keep everyone updated if there are any setbacks to our estimated schedule. 
What else can you do to help?
The best thing you can do to help us out is to share our campaign! Tell your friends and neighbors and share the campaign through your social media platforms. We appreciate every single share and tweet from the top to the bottom of our hearts! 
My dream for this project may have been deferred, but it has never dried up!
When I was in the sixth grade I won a writing contest. If that win was just based on my illustrations alone, my accomplishment would not have been a big deal. But it truly was! That win came from a kid whose English skills were in the lowest percentile of his sixth-grade class. Creativity has never been an issue for me. But I thank God for a good teacher who used her personal treasure of time and worked with me long hours after school until my sentence structure matched my illustration ability, and it paid off!
Lisha’s and my dream of seeing this book materialize have been ours for years, decades even! I know that deep down inside, ever since that food give-away—the main plot of the book, I’ve wanted to share this story, but because of the lack of finance along with publishers not wanting to pay for 34 color illustrations, those things have kept this book from happening until now! As reality unfolds, and more often than not, achieving success requires the following: great leaps of faith, initiative exercised, and tenacity. These coupled with the right opportunity leads to destiny realized, but let me not leave out the power and benefit of prayer!
The establishing of this printing campaign simulates the scenario of my six-grade book contest and smacks me right back to it. The writing, editing, and illustrations for this book ‒I have done‒ but what I lack right now is money! Today, you sit where that beloved teacher once sat: in the seat of power and where you, too, can make a difference in my life; that of a 59-year-old man whose dream has been deferred, but not dried up! With your dollars, I am closer to living out that dream of seeing Gary & a Box of Salt  in print form and in stores within a matter of months.

The printing of this book will be a great accomplishment for us all. Won’t you please help by sending in your money today? Thank you! If you like my story and would help but are lacking in finance, rest assured, you can still help and be on our team! Just use your influence with your social media network partners and let people know about my Indiegogo page and ask them to support for my campaign. Remember, no gift is too small; every dollar given gets us closer to our maximum goal, and together, we can do this!

story:
Pre-Order:

Order SINGULARITY, the eagerly anticipated sequel to JESSICA, by Helena Hann-Basquiat, Sara Litchfield, Sandy Ramsey, Lizzi Rogers and Hannah Sears.

Jessica B. Bell is not real. 
A couple of years ago I started writing horror stories and Jessica was born. I had fun creating a twisted and ominous biography for her, painting a picture of some crazy hermit who lived in my basement and wrote stories on old parchment using her own blood for ink. 
But she was never real. 
Real or not, an unspeakable act of violence leaves the residents of Ward C, home of a secret experiment, dead – torn apart. There is only one survivor… 
What happens when the creation surpasses the creator? 
How far will Jessica go to be real? 
Find out in SINGULARITY

What Advance Readers are Saying:

"Such a creative premise. In a world where everything goes by formula, Singularity is a refreshing (and horrifying) departure from formula."  - Andra Watkins, author of To Live Forever: An Afterlife Journey of Meriwether Lewis
"Singularity will haunt you, but it is so much more than a thriller or a horror novel. It will challenge your thoughts and ideas and make you explore... notions that will leave you chilled and a little unsettled." - Gretchen Weber Kelly, writer at Drifting Through My Open Mind
"This book is for anyone who likes twisted tales, creative non-linear storytelling, deep thoughts, and the possibility that what we perceive as reality is only in our minds." - Lisa Kramer, author of P.O.W.ER
"Jessica B. Bell is back. She is such a dark and stormy, twisted character that you want to hate, but cannot help wanting to know what she is up to, what she is going to do next." - Lindsay Holmes
"... it'll feel like you're meeting an old friend again. Even if that old friend does scare the bejeezus out of you. And make you wet your pants just a little." - Freya McMillan, co-author of JESSICA

Why Pre-Order?

  • Support Indie authors by paying them direct for books.
  • Get personal touches not available through booksellers like Amazon, etc...

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  •  Get the word out and make some noise about the Indiegogo pre-order on social media like Facebook, Twitter, etc.
  • Point a friend you think would like JESSICA & SINGULARITY in this direction

story:
So here's the deal:

As people who have met me for fifteen seconds know, I just wrote and self published a book called "Kevin and Matt Fail to Save the World" about two erstwhile knuckleheads who, well, fail to save the world. Repeatedly. Good times.

The book is a pop culture laden action adventure buddy comedy sort of thing that takes on some of the most common apocalypse tropes in a funny and often gruesomely violent sort of way.

Through this platform, you can purchase a copy of the book (which does, in fact, exist) or throw extra money my way to get the cool stuff and help me pimp this book like it was my bottom biatch.

What I'm aiming to do (in that I sort of live in a connection free literary vacuum) is tour this silly thing from coast to coast at comedy clubs, coffee shops, punk rock communes, etc. It will also help to build and maintain a website for all that sort of stuff.

Sadly, this sort of thing costs dollars and as people who know me know, I don't have those. In fact, I probably owe you $20. So here's a way to help me not owe you $20 ever again (hopefully). Also, the 50 large target goal isn't a hard and fast number so much as it's what I assume would be enough, in 20's to fill a brief case.

Your contribution will defray the costs of travelling about this fair country in an attempt to hype this book like it was Run DMC and I was Flava Flav. Now Scream!!

Now Scream!!

story:
Short Summary

Agape Press is founded by a teacher who loses her job, because someone lied and said, "That she cannot read." The best way to beat a lie is to own your own company, operate it, and help others in the process.

Agape Press is a Publishing Company is founded by an author who has face ups and the downs of publishing. I know what it is like to see your book scattered across the internet and you haven't receive a royalty check. Agape Press wants to help writers to get their voice back. There idea and thought are important and someone needs to hear about it.

In order to do that we need to purchase a Book Expresso Machine. This machine cost $160,000 and we need funds to get new office space to expand our business. This machine will allow us to be able to print our own books, so that we can cut out the middle man and do our own distribution. Then the authors will able to receive the royalty checks that they deserve.

My campaign is called, "Take The Love Challenge." In this challenge you will have to donate the money  and the perk that you picked you will have to do what the challenge ask of you. Then you will have to post it to my facebook page. Then you challenge someone else to take the challenge.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Agape-Press-Publishing-Company/905553386121607  

What We Need & What You Get

We need to purchase The Book Expresso Machine and we need office space.

  • The Book Expresso Machine cost about $160,000.
  • Then we need office space and office supplies.
  • We need to train more staff.

What you will get. You will be able to participate in, "The Love Challenge."

The Impact

By meeting our goal it would  allow us to help thousands of authors to become publish author and we can give them there voice back. There dream will live and they will be inspired to write other books. This impact it could effect the next four generations if we all work together. It could change the publishing industry forever

Risks & Challenges

There are really no risks. The most challenging part will be getting the word out to others and raising up the money. Everything else is taken care of.I have been writing for twenty years and I have been studying the publishing industry for seven years. and I'm the author of eight books. I'm also a teacher. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute then you can help us by advertising. Post our link on your facebook, twitter and social media sites. Here is the link:

http://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/2c3534cb

story:
Hi All! 

The renewed Fabayo.com website took off recently with its regular updates!:)

Now you are MOST WELCOME to visit it!

Please, send me your comments, wishes and advises!


Big Thanks to all our supporters! 

The message is still on and we continue to raise money for a great new

Fabayo.com website. 

Anyone who wishes to support this project further can do so by donating on the actual website http://fabayo.com 


What is Fabayo.com?

When you think of the Future what do you see in your mind’s eye?

I see advancing Technology and Science in harmony with Nature.

Sure, it is just one of many roads humanity can take..

But let me be a little optimistic. 

And let me tell you about Fabayo.com, the news website that I am running. 

http://fabayo.com

Actually, for the moment, with its basic design and without new updates - it is more of a sketch, an idea, if you like.

But.

Its potential is vast. It is aiming to be a powerful and fascinating website.

In fact - Fabayo can make a difference.


Why is Fabayo.com different from other news websites?


First of all let me briefly describe how it works. 

It is simple in its principle.

I am looking for the most revolutionary news on major processes happening on Earth and in the Cosmos (in terms of what is uncovered for us), then I place links to the relevant articles on Fabayo.com and invite you to read them on exceptional scientific, environmental and techno websites and blogs.

And let me make a little remark here, - I am NOT promoting anyone. My choice of the websites and blogs that I am referring to is unengaged, intuitive, objective and always open.

By revolutionary news I mean news that constitutes a turning point, news that are a catalyst for the Future. News that transfigures Science, Technology, Environment, Cosmology and what we know about ourselves as Humans, or news that simply awes us, like, for instance, a photo of a new nebula... News to enable this and future generations to see the big picture, to generalize and to be inspired. 

I think you would agree that to stand on the the shoulders of a giant versus standing on the ground reveals a very different perspective.

I believe one day Fabayo.com can one day become this giant. 


Where your contribution is going


As I already mentioned, at the moment Fabayo.com has a basic design. 

Being an amateur in website building, I've modified a free template that was initially created for blogs and not for news websites. 

To transform Fabayo into a full power informational website I need funding:

 1. To change its design with the help of a professional web designer. 

 2. To have a special program written by a web developer for adding news links in one click. Right now the links adding process takes far too much time - from 15 to 25 min, this also includes adding tags, keyword for All in one SEO pack and new words for the search engine and excludes a selective search for these news links. I've made inquiries and one of the developers agreed to write this program for 2000$.

 3. To add a new feature ( I hope this will come with a new design and will not cost a lot) that would stretch Fabayo's boundaries so that the people who enjoy visiting it could also take part in searching and adding new links.

 4. For a consultation and eventual help from a Search Engine Optimizer. 

If I don't reach my goal of 3500$ then at least I can start few processes about transforming Fabayo and will continue to search for investments.

 Once again - any ideas from you would be greatly appreciated!!


What qualifies me to run a website like this and what are my challenges  


I have a degree in psychology and other qualifications but that's not what enables me to manage Fabayo and nurture it into something big.

What really qualifies me is:

- I am fascinated by the advancing technology of our time and am convinced that in future it will even exceed our expectations.

- Science is almost my religion.

- Earth is my home. Its issues are my issues and its joys, - like renewables, carbon cuts, eco living, aware people, are my joys.

- My heart sinks every time I have to throw out a plastic bag in a country that does not recycle.

- And.. I have a feeling for the Future. 

It is something very subtle...Possibilities that are both existing and non-existing at the same time..

The main challenge is - I am parenting alone, my son is only 2,5 and he would always be the first in line for my attention. That's why I need tools for managing Fabayo in a fast, efficient manner and attract more people into helping me. 

In future I envisage a talented team working with me on Fabayo.com


Global project


I've chosen the Republic of Ireland as my launch country because my official address and bank account are there. I had started to create Fabayo in Malaysia and currently I am in Ukraine. 

However, Fabayo does not belong to any country - it is a worldwide project.

I look out for news from different corners of the Earth and also try to use websites and blogs from different countries, even though my choice is limited to English language news sources.

Recently I've read that atmospheric carbon dioxide levels hit a record of 400 ppm. That's the highest level ever recorded..   

We really have no choice but to raise our awareness from local to global and start to take care.. 

The Earth is our home. 

If we start to think and act like that - many issues mankind is facing today will eventually vanish.



Our little team


Our team actually consists only of Fabayo.com and me :) But I really hope that one day there will be a real team.

I would like to say a special thank you to Ciaran Connolly for editing my English for this project and Stephen Judge for his ideas. 


Other ways you can help


If you cannot invest but still like my project - please make some noise about the campaign! You can also do so by using Indiegogo share tools! :-)

story:
Short Summary

Note: You don't have a minimum value for the contribution! Any amount is a great help for this project! The perks containing signed books start at 40 euros. 

Lire en français:


Leia em português:


Nota: Relativamente às contribuições, qualquer valor pode ser contribuído e qualquer valor será uma enorme ajuda! As ofertas juntamente com os valores contribuídos, começam nos 40 euros, com vários moldes que oferecem os livros assinados.

Leer en español:


Read in English:

I'm an author from Portugal, here you have my website: www.thepatr.com

Since 2014, I've dedicated exclusively to writing and I've published two novels since then  (Inertia - 2014 and Cat's Pajamas - 2015), one of those is being translated to English at the moment and will be soon published in that language. 

I'm working on my next novel called Men Will Never Know Any Of This that will hopefully be published by December, 2015. For this new novel I thought about releasing a new and different format and launch, simultaneously, an extras book. This extras book will work as an extras dvd, with illustrations, collages, paintings, photography and music that recreates the character's lives, relationships and events depicted in Men Will Never Know Any Of This. The book will be bilingual (Portuguese and English).

I've been authorized by Michael Zanger to use his Mount Shasta's sunrise image (the cover for this crowfund) that will be featured on the novel's cover, since it has a relevant symbolism in the plot. 


The title of this novel was the title of a handmade book my father did when he was in his early twenties with poems and photographs he took. I grew up reading this book and his personal wanderings so it's important for me to keep the title. I will also have an illustration made over this picture, similar to my father's book cover and related to the main characters of the novel. 


The contributions will be essential for the acquisition for most of the works ordered, since I'm contacting a lot of different artists from different countries and artistic backgrounds.  I'm also trying to choose artists with different styles, so the perspectives will be broader. Besides the paintings (oil on canvas), drawings and illustrations, I'm also contacting musicians to create an album with a few songs that will recreate the main character's album (Ian is a guitar player in 1969, with a big Led Zeppelin influence).

Both books (the novel and the extras book) will also be published in english (the date is not available yet), by self-published edition or by a publisher.

Artists involved

I made an estimated 5000€ contribution, since most artists charge between 100€ to 500€ (and more symbolic budgets from personal connections) and I'm contacting around 20 artists, plus the musicians. 

Until now, I have 18 different artists confirmed.

From the Portuguese artists, I have confirmed and that are ALREADY WORKING (note, the images below are examples of their work, not the images for the book ):


Ana Luís Quintão


Sara Feio


Pedro Lourenço


Zé Pereira


Tiago Dinis


Vanessa Neves


Barbara Moura



From the International artists, I have confirmed (note, the images below are examples of their work, not the images for the book):

Ana Bagayan 


Eugenia Loli


Ars Moriendee


Lola Dupré


Antonina Aleksandrova


Adrian Baxter


Theoretical Part


Igor Piwowaczyk

Dan Mora

Marina Gonzalez Eme



Please see the Perks section on the right side of this page for the various bundles available. Then simply click on the appropriate perk to pre-order.

If the funds don't reach the entire goal, the book will still be released. But note, the higher the budget, the better the artists will invest time and detail in their works. If I can offer their standard budget, they can relate the work to the novel's synopsis and plot with original work.  


Why an extras book?

This will work like an extras dvd and it's an innovative and original format for a book. The novel tells us about the story of a family told through time and through different characters. It has a non-linear storyline and each character has their own personal universe and references. Music is an important bond between them and my idea is to have proofs and illustrations about the characters and their universes. I have a lot of complementary documents I'll also attach to the extras book (the character's charts, the full family tree, all the research I did for each character's world, and drawings/paintings and collages that somehow recreate photographies, paintings and scenes that are refered in the book).

Since 2014, I have self-published two previous novels, both written in Portuguese, and their sales have been successful to the Portuguese book market. My latest novel is currently being translated to English, while I'm presenting it in different cities in Portugal (you can keep track in my facebook's author page).  www.facebook.com/thepatr

Risks & Challenges

My challenge is to get the highest budget possible, so I can pay the artists and they'll do original work related to the novel. Otherwise, I'll have to cut some of them out and/or use already existing images of their work (that won't be truly representative of the novel's plot).


If you can't give your contribution, it will be a lot of help if you share this campaign with your contacts.

Thank you so much in advance for backing this crowdfunding campaign! Your support matters a lot!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Note: You don't have a minimum value for the contribution! Any amount is a great help for this project! The perks containing signed books start at 40 euros.

story:
Have you ever been in depression?  Do you know how you can help someone battle depression?

My name is Pamela. I battled 7 years of depression. I have been through many challenges in my life. Having gone through several near death experiences, I have written my book Love Heals to inspire and help those who are battling depression. Many people do not realize that depression is a big problem. People who are depressed are often misunderstood. All they need is love and concern. However, not many people understand how to help them on their journey.

This book is based on a true personal journey of how I came out of depression and the many challenges that I have faced in my life. I want to reach out to more people around the world and help them. I want to make the world a better place for everyone. If you know of someone who is currently going through depression and need help, please help them. All they need is your care and attention.

Here are what some people said after reading my book :

  • " I just wanted to let you know that I read  your book from start to finish in less than 12 hours! I started at 12am last night and just finished it now - what a story!!!!! It's so well written!!!  Simple, sincere, from the Heart and so full of love!   Thank you!     I love how you always have a reflection at the end of each chapter (that has helped me reflect too) and I love how you always have a gift .... it's truly beautiful, Pamela! Amazing amazing courage to write it and amazing journey you'hv had...  Lots of Love, Mishell
  • Just completed reading about your life's story and am sure it will definitely touches life and change life....   Your husband Eric is God's send and your three lovely kids Aidan, Aston and Alvis are God's Gifts to you to compensate you for your suffering... in your early life....         KT Ong
  • I finished reading your book. thanks for sharing your journey - what a 'challenging' and at times 'excruciating' journey. may our Lord keep you and your family in the pink of health: physically, spiritually, emotionally and financially.  Pheck Hwa 
  • Pamela has turned her life around, and written this book about her journey. Hopefully it can help you in your own journey. Randy Gage, Author of the New York Times bestsellers 'Risky Is the New Safe and Mad Genius'
  • An amazing and inspiring story showing courage, love and trust.  Genecia Alluora, Founder, Queenz8 Business Group & SoulRichWoman.com
  • Love Heals is the most candid, soul-baring book I have ever read. The book - Pamela's no-holds-barred account of her real life story - is an engrossing if sometimes painful read of mistakes made and lessons learned; relationships betrayed and love found; normal human failings and uncommon human strengths. Pamela's journey is our journey. When one of us falls, we all fall; when one of us rises, we all rise.   Vinay Kumar Rai, Writer

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help me in so many way!!!! 

  • POST THIS VIDEO, ask the people you know to post it too, and share my passion for changing the world with anyone you think is a positive change maker looking to make a difference!
  • Contact any newspapers, TV stations, or journalists you know and tell them about how I am trying to save the world. If you believe in me and my compassion, let them know that. 
  • Add a comment on this campaign (that helps drive this campaign higher in the rankings
  • Send an email out to your friends and family about what I am doing. 
  • Have the courage to be amazing! 
  • You can make  a difference to someone else.

Thank you for still reading!  I love you. You are amazing!  Please help me so that I can reach out to others to change their lives! God Bless!

story:
Short Summary

"Like a nervous magician waiting in the wings"-Blues Traveler
  • Joshua Stenkamp has been a professional magician, actor and performance instructor for over a decade

    In addition to magic Josh is accomplished trivia  host and has a deep knowledge and love of useless information ranging from movies, television, music and theatrical arts (he’s a walking talking Google). He combines his love of magic, music and trivia into an engaging and interactive experience for audiences worldwide.
  • Being a Magician and Actor i had a vast collection of books, manuals basically a database of information. The only thing i did not have was a guide to being a working magician. I found nothing that answered the questions i needed, to be a successful magician. After long discussions with Jason Wethington and multiple performers, We came to the conclusion there is no "ONE" book to giving the perfect advice. So we are making that "ONE" book.
  • "A Magician Prepares" is and will be the "ONE" book magicians will want to read. We are getting the best magicians in the world to give the answers to all the questions a performer needs to succeed. A journey of this magnitude has never been done before. In person Interviews with the top magicians asking indepth questions on how they got started, Dealing with failure/success, writing process, their personal journey and advice to be a working magician.
  • Be apart of something that will be remembered as the "Magic" book.

 We Need & What You Get

"Give a little bit of your love to me"-Supertramp
  • Your Support Donations will fund the making of this journey. Publishing the book-Artwork-Transcriptions of the interviews (if it becomes too much for me to handle)- Creating the Audio Download- Shipping. The Donations will be a great help in my travel to interview these amazing performers. Airfare-Hotels-Car Rentals. I am lucky to have a beautiful fight attendant wife, so i can travel discounted ( not as glamorous as everyone thinks, its standby and i don't travel everywhere). I have interviewed 4 performers out of town since 7/27/15 with your help we can make our deadline of Oct 2016 Release!
  • Well you want to help? That Awesome! we have some great Perks for you to enjoy when you donate specific amounts. take a look at them on the perks section. they vary from a 10$ donation that gets you the e-book, To a $1,000 donation where will dedicate the book to you!! find which one you like the best. 
  • Let's say we for some reason we do no reach the goal? (hopefully we do reach it) If the goal is not met the funds that have been raised will go towards the making of the book. The Perks will be Honored!!! The only thing that would change would be the release date. 

The Impact

"If i could change the world" -Eric Clapton

  • A Magician Prepares is something the world of magic has never seen. If you are or know a magician ask them/yourself. Have you ever read a magic book that has 30 magicians giving personal advice on performing? We haven't heard of one. You are being apart of a something great, a book that will be considered a must read in the magic and entertainment community. 
  • As stated earlier we have interviewed 4 magicians as of 7/27/15. The Amazing Johnathan, Rudy Coby, Mac King and Tony Brent. When you donate we will give you up to date schedules on when the next performer is going to be interviewed (we receive messages everyday from magicians about wanting to be interviewed), 
  • I have never been one to ask favors... Helping us out to create this would be the greatest gift any one could give. My first interview was given because i simply asked and The Amazing Johnathan was kind enough to say yes. If you like the concept and believe that we are trying to bring knowledge to an art, I thank you.


 Other Ways You Can Help

"I get by with a little help from my friends"-Beatles

  • If you cannot donate, We understand. Another way to help is sharing this on Social media.
  • Share this using the Indiegogo share tools!

"All i need to make a comedy is park, a police man and a pretty lady"- Charles Chaplin

story:
About the Author: The idea for this children’s story first came to mind while on the mission field in Africa. Like all kids I grew up with a love for bugs. As I considered factual information about earthworms in the context of missions and the truth concerning our human nature I found an interesting connection, which inspired this story. Besides missions in Africa I’ve also done mission work in Europe and throughout the U.S. I served as a mission’s pastor for 4 years, and currently work at Focus on the Family where my love for truth and children is continuing to grow.

All donations will go towards the cost of illustrations. I'm hoping to raise 500-1000 towards the cost of illustrations. Lighthouse Christian Publishing has offered to publish this book for me. They will take care of book layout, printing, marketing, etc. However, I would like the illustrations to be done by an excellent artist who is passionate about this story. Check out his work on his website. He has recently done some great work for Focus on the Family and for the contemporary Christian artist, JJ Heller.  As you know, professional illustrations make all the difference in a Children's story, so I appreciate your help. 

For your donation of any amount I will send you the book for free as soon as it is available. Please spread the word especially among parents of younger kids who will enjoy this book.

story:
My name is Matt Weber I am planning on publishing my third book, China from A to Z.  I am a 3rd grade teacher in California and I have already self published two books: San Francisco the Alphabet Book and California's Missions from A to Z.  During college and after, I lived in China (Beijing) for 5 summers from 1995 to 2003. 

I will be reprinting a prior title (missions), and have the opportunity to include China from A to Z in the print-run, making the cost feasible for me to publish this book too, which I have been waiting/wanting to do now for a while. 

I am putting the book on Indiegogo to pre-sell it.  I am hoping that by already having committed sales, I can increase my print volume enough to decrease my cost per book enough, that I can do better than just "breaking even" as I did on my other two titles. 

Using the alphabet as a framework, learn about the sights, history, and culture of China over 26 topics.  A is for Acrobats, B is for Beijing, C is for Chopsticks, D is for Dragon, E is for Emperor, ... Z is for Zodiac.

Each letter has fantastic color photographs, an introductory rhyme, and three interesting and educational facts.  This book is great for kids, libraries, visitors, or anybody interested in learning more about China in a quick and easy read.

Please help me by pre-purchasing my book so I can choose to publish China from A to Z.
Thank you!!!

story:
Short Summary


"the 505050 project" Objective:

Phase 1: Travel to all 50 states within 50 days and script 50 original poems.

Phase 2: Publish and sell this original book of poetry to raise awareness and donations for the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.

When:

Phase 1: October 21, 2015 - December 9, 2015

Phase 2: December 10, 2015 - December 31, 2015 

Goal:

My wish is that this project grants as many sick children's wishes as possible and inspires people to find their own unique method of fundraising for their favorite charitable organization.  

How: 

I will create one original poem in each of the 50 United States within 50 days - totalling 50 original poems. 

To verify my location, I will "check-in" on Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram) and post a photo from each state I visit. Once I've driven through all of the "drive-able" 48 states; I will fly to Alaska and then finalize this trip by flying to Hawaii. Aloha!

Once I finish this epic journey, I will publish my original book of poetry and donate 50% of all sale proceeds to the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.

What We Need & What You Get

The average cost for granting a "wish" through the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America is $7500.  If I can make one child's wish come true with this project, I will have succeeded!  100% of donations received through this Indiegogo campaign will be donated to the  Make-a-Wish Foundation of America since I have already budgeted travel, lodging, food and self publication. 

If you would like to pre-order the finished book, "the 505050 project", please message me.  50% of all sale profits will be donated to the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.  I am estimating the cost per book to be around $25-$30.  

"the 505050 project" book should be available for purchase on January 30th, 2016. 

The Impact

In a world full of negative news and global violence; My only hope for "the 505050 project" is that my words and your donations will help grant at least one child's wish. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want to contribute financially to "the 505050 project", that's ok! If you like the idea, please share it on your social media accounts and tell your friends and family so I can build awareness and raise as many donations as possible.
story_txt:
Short Summary


"the 505050 project" Objective:
Phase 1: Travel to all 50 states within 50 days and script 50 original poems.
Phase 2: Publish and sell this original book of poetry to raise awareness and donations for the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.
When:
Phase 1: October 21, 2015 - December 9, 2015
Phase 2: December 10, 2015 - December 31, 2015 
Goal:
My wish is that this project grants as many sick children's wishes as possible and inspires people to find their own unique method of fundraising for their favorite charitable organization.  
How: 
I will create one original poem in each of the 50 United States within 50 days - totalling 50 original poems. 
To verify my location, I will "check-in" on Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram) and post a photo from each state I visit. Once I've driven through all of the "drive-able" 48 states; I will fly to Alaska and then finalize this trip by flying to Hawaii. Aloha!
Once I finish this epic journey, I will publish my original book of poetry and donate 50% of all sale proceeds to the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.
What We Need & What You Get

The average cost for granting a "wish" through the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America is $7500.  If I can make one child's wish come true with this project, I will have succeeded!  100% of donations received through this Indiegogo campaign will be donated to the  Make-a-Wish Foundation of America since I have already budgeted travel, lodging, food and self publication. 
If you would like to pre-order the finished book, "the 505050 project", please message me.  50% of all sale profits will be donated to the Make-a-Wish Foundation of America.  I am estimating the cost per book to be around $25-$30.  
"the 505050 project" book should be available for purchase on January 30th, 2016.

story:
Who am I?

I’m an animal-loving, green tea drinking, sarcasm wielding young adult author from Halifax, Nova Scotia. I spend some days working with children and families who struggle with communication disorders as a speech language pathologist. I spend other days writing stories. In my spare time I drive my kids around to rinks and gyms and pools and music studios. 

I already have two books published (Game Plan, Aptitude) but this is my first foray into self-publishing. I’m super excited about delving into this aspect of publishing with the help of an excellent team of publishing professionals.

Why self-pub?

Why not? Self publishing gives authors a different way of getting their books into the hands of readers. My first two books were published through an indie publisher so I wanted to give self publishing a go.

What’s this book all about?

It Should Have Been a #GoodDay is about bullies, friendships, acceptance and the choices that teens make in an effort to just get through the day. It’s also about perceptions and how a person’s past can affect their opinion of the present. Here’s the blurb:

Sometimes a situation is not what you think it is

The new girl — Emily hopes to leave a painful event behind her by starting at a new school, but it looks like that’s just a pipe dream.

The golden boy — Brogan is the big man on campus until a knee injury has him sidelined. Now he’s struggling to hold on to his top dog position while dealing with the fact that his life is falling apart.

The popularity seeker— Thomas desperately wants to be one of the popular kids. He can feel it in his grasp, as long as he doesn’t let his nice guy status get in the way.

The heart of gold — Henry doesn’t know he’s different, although everyone else at his school does. And the popular kids spare no efforts in showing him he doesn’t fit in.

As they go through an ordinary day of negotiating halls, classes and the baggage of their lives, each of them has no idea that their paths will cross in such a way that will change their lives forever.

Sometimes what should have been a good day turns out to be the worst day of your life. 

Why support this campaign?

Isn’t it great when an author tries something new? And isn’t it great when you get to be a part of that? Helping me self publish It Should Have Been a #GoodDay gives you a chance to get your hands on an amazing YA novel and help an author get her book out into the word. 

This novel will be released in February 2016. Professional quality publishing includes many stages and services. 

Substative editing: $500
Copy Editing: $240
Proofing: $240
Cover Design: $450
Interior Design: $350
Marketing: $220

Risks & Challenges

Risks? what risks? I guess there's the risk that you'll fall in love with #GoodDay and experience severe post-book hangover waiting for my next novel? To help you out with that, check out Game Plan and Aptitude, both available now!

Other Ways You Can Help

Support for writers is offered in many ways. Beside opting into one of the great rewards level or if you are unable to support this cause financially, please consider requesting this book from your local library, talking about the title with your reading friends and/or passing on this message to anyone who would be interested in this title.You can help spread the word on social media.You can send good karma our way. Everything helps!

story:
New Wartune Update! 


Wartune 5.2 has launched.

We've optimized a bunch of systems, and added some new systems.

Enjoy!


About the Project

Wartune is making its literary debut!

After three years of epic RPG action we’ve decided that it’s time to give the story a little more oomph. You probably know the basics: slay the dragon, power up the Eudaemon, and become super powerful, but it’s time we added a little more depth to all this. A little more romance, a little more heart-wrenching sorrow, a little more oo-lala. We’re going to explain why you’re building the most powerful city in the world, and who you were before. We want you to know where the evil has come from, and why the goddess must stop it. We want you to understand the true hero you’ve become. There’s so much more to the Wartune universe than just click and kill, and we want to share it with you.

Unfortunately while we have a great story to tell, none of us on the Wartune team are novelists. We don’t have the skills to create the beautiful epic that Wartune deserves. So in order to accomplish this fantastic endeavour we need your support!


The Novel

The young prince, once had everything - a life people envied, doting parents, a caring master, and a bright future that only come with being the son of King Ferrero. Those times have been forgotten, swept away by tragedy and war. A war driven and dictated by the whims of one man. No, not a man.

A god.

Knight crusader Yannick, the prince's master and friend, is charged with making him a man worthy of his father's throne. The boy only needs time - time to heal, time to live. But will humanity endure that long?

A chilling prophecy drives the rapidly turning wheel of events fed by the greed and thirst for power of one god. Where would Earth's salvation come from? The forgotten Prince or the seasoned warrior Alkorn? Will humanity survive?


The Author

Chioma Osifo is an author and teacher. She was inspired by David Gemmell, the bestselling British fantasy writer, to begin her craft. Her years of experience writing novels, biographies and memoirs have allowed her to move far beyond her background in physiology.

When approached about writing the novel, Chioma quickly offered up an incredible outline and was awarded the privilege because of her enthusiasm and unique style. She is excited to channel her creative talents and experience garnered from writing novels like Regrets, and A Circle, and to take up the challenge of creating compelling characters and a hero fans will resonate with.


Never played Wartune?

Not a problem! There will still be plenty to enjoy in this epic fantasy novel, and everything you need to know is:

Wartune is a 2.5D real-time RPG + Strategic browser game that uses 3D rendered 2D technology so players can enjoy the maximum visual experience. It received Facebook's Top Asian Game Award in 2014, and has over 10 million registered users. Players focus on developing a castle to strengthen their main character, who then proceeds to complete nigh-impossible quests and challenge epic bosses from the depths of hell itself. Players will have to recruit powerful troops and allies succeed. The road is long, but the reward is your Kingdom!

Head to http://www.wartune.com/novel/index.html 

or www.facebook.com/wartune for more information.


Backer Perks
Notes:
1.  All items will be sent free-of-charge. 

2. Virtual gift bag A (Worth $10): Sack of Gold*20, Adv. Mahra*100, Henna*100, Lvl. 7 HP Gem*1

    Virtual gift bag B (Worth $200): Sack of Gold*200, Adv. Mahra*300, Advanced, Henna*100, Lvl. 10 HP Gem*1

3.  Backer must have an account on Wartune.com to receive the virtual gift bags.

More rewards！

If the number of the backers reaches 50,all the backers can get Sack of Gold*20，Henna*50 as rewards;

If the number of the backers reaches 100,all the backers can Sack of Gold*50，Henna*100，Advanced Henna*10 as rewards;

If shares of the crowdfunding on Facebook reach 500, players of all servers will get Gold*500,000, Daru*500,000, Mahra*30, Sylph Sepulcrum*30,  Good Luck Charm*5, Fashion Core*5 as rewards.

If shares of the crowdfunding on Facebook reach 1000, players of all servers will get Gold*800,000, Daru*800,000, Mahra*50, Sylph Sepulcrum*80,  Good Luck Charm*10, Fashion Core*10 as rewards.


How We’ll Use the Funds

Here is a rough estimate of where your money will go:

25% Writing&editing Expenses - She's got an epic story coming for you, but she's also got editing fees.

40% Backer Rewards - This will be weighted more heavily if we get more money. Everything extra goes to the backers.

10% Indiegogo and Processing Fees - Bank fees, transfer fees, credit card fees...seriously. It's a fee-pocalyse.

25% Marketing - We've had a couple of sponsored articles written, and we'll also be doing some Facebook ads. Spend money to make money and all that jazz.


Campaign Risks

The more we are funded, the better the novel will end up being. This novel is coming out no matter what, but we need you to help make it better! 


FAQ

1. What languages will the book be translated to?

The book will be in English. We would love to publish it in other languages, but for the time being we have no plans to do so.

2. On which devices will the e-book be available?

We will make sure that the digital version is available for all major e-book platforms.

If you have any more questions, please add a comment and we will answer as soon as we can.

story:
1 Livre illustré pour enfants-adolescents  

Je t'aimais tant - Vivre le deuil de son animal de compagnie

Ce lien qui unit l'enfant et l'adolescent à son animal de compagnie est unique. Toutes les confidences, les rêves, les amours qui lui sont partagés meurent-ils avec lui? Comment apprivoiser ce vide que crée ce départ prévu ou inattendu?

1 Livre pour adultes:

Le deuil animalier: Le reconnaître - L'apprivoiser - Le vivre

Chacun vit une relation unique avec son animal de compagnie durant des années et des années. C'est "cute" de parler de son copain à plume, à poils ou autres de son vivant. Qu'en est-il lorsqu'il décède?

Démystifier le deuil animalier est une mission qui me tient à cœur. Pour ce faire il est impératif de le reconnaître. Comprendre les états du deuil est un pas de plus pour l'apprivoiser. Vous savez, une relation qui dure pendant tant d'années mérite de se permettre de vivre ses émotions avec autant de couleurs qu'il peut en exister chacun à son rythme. 

Le deuil animalier est un vrai deuil qu'on se le dise, qu'on se le répète afin de mieux le vivre.

Lynne Pion est une femme authentique, douce, attentionnée, audacieuse et passionnée ayant pour mission de démystifier les deuils de la vie et vous accompagner pour les apprivoiser.

Auteure du livre « Est-ce que tout le monde meurt? » elle a créé son blogue Deuil-Vie-Résilience en 2011 sur le site www.lynnepion.com maintenant référé dans la francophonie.

En 2015 elle créait le blogue deuil animalier sur le site www.deuilanimalier.com ressentant l'omerta ressentit lors du décès d'un animal de compagnie qui a pourtant partagé la vie de la personne ou la famille pendant des années.

Elle a participé au premier événement TEDxQuébec  en novembre 2012 sa conférence ayant pour titre « La mort n’est pas contagieuse». 

Quoi qu’on puisse vous dire, le deuil d’un animal de compagnie est un vrai deuil. Imaginez le nombres d’années que vous partagerez avec votre compagnon...Comment l'apprivoiser?

story:
Timeless Talk...

Ever wonder what would conclude someone crazy enough to concoct couture and urban street wear mixed with vintage clothing? Well, welcome to Modern Stitches Magazine. Founded in 2013 by a graduate publishing student, Ashley Scarboro who considered her obsessive thrift shopping more than just a hobby and decided it deserved a platform. It was then she developed a brand in a market that was yet to be discovered. Currently the magazine is solely digital, this year, 2016, we present "A New Level of Vintage." However, we need you, fashion enthusiasts, boutique owners, self-proclaimed thrift moguls fashion historians and all that can appreciate the idea of  discovering true luxury treasures to donate. 
Fashion is a part of our everyday lives and for those of us who chose to dress outside of the box and want to reinvent our style, Modern Stitches is for your. It is important to us that we deliver exhilarating a relatable journalism with flawless images page by page. How many times have you thought to yourself, "I love that outfit, but how would I put it together? Where would I find it?" We're here to assist and be a go-to guide for vintage.Whether you donate $5 or $500 you have moved the mark to make this publication that closer to your local newsstand for years to come. 
The Deets...

Each donation will go towards funding for quality photography, features, photo shoots and printing costs. (Who knew paper could be so expensive?!) Currently, our goal is $5000 to begin the logistics of artwork and the layouts for each printed issue for this year. As you begin to donate, we at Modern Stitches consider you part of the team and you will then receive a gift of appreciation! Everyone loves gifts, right?! 

According your donation:

$10-$50 
-Your name printed on the Modern Stitches website as a sponsor 

$60-$200
-Your name printed on the Modern Stitches website as a sponsor 
- One (1) Modern Stitches t-shirt with the magazine logo
-One (1) surprise beauty bag!

$300+
-Your name printed on the Modern Stitches website as sponsor
-One (1) Modern Stitches t-shirt with the magazine logo
-One (1) surprise beauty bag!
-You and a guest will receive free entry into the official Modern Stitches Launch Experience!!! 


What this means...

Over the course of three years, Modern Stitches has developed and truly reached tons of people per day. In the beginning this was simply just an idea stemming from the racks of gently used items that one day turned into an interview with Cycle21 winner, Keith Carlos of America's Next Top Model. "Fashion only repeats itself," he said and that's what we're all about. Valuing the present while incorporating past fashion with no geographical limitations. With your help, Modern Stitches can further the vintage feel and reveal fashion's best kept secret, thrift! 

If you are unable to contribute directly, no sweat! Please feel free to encourage others to do so. This will benefit us all and with you're help, the magazine will get the exposure it deserves.
