$300+-Your name printed on the Modern Stitches website as sponsor-One (1) Modern Stitches t-shirt with the magazine logo-One (1) surprise beauty bag!-You and a guest will receive free entry into the official Modern Stitches Launch Experience!!! 


    What this means... Over the course of three years, Modern Stitches has developed and truly reached tons of people per day. In the beginning this was simply just an idea stemming from the racks of gently used items that one day turned into an interview with Cycle21 winner, Keith Carlos of America's Next Top Model. "Fashion only repeats itself," he said and that's what we're all about. Valuing the present while incorporating past fashion with no geographical limitations. With your help, Modern Stitches can further the vintage feel and reveal fashion's best kept secret, thrift! 
If you are unable to contribute directly, no sweat! Please feel free to encourage others to do so. This will benefit us all and with you're help, the magazine will get the exposure it deserves.

story:
My name is Sarah, and I'd like to tell my weight-loss story.

  I'll give you a brief version of it here, but what I'd really like to do is share the entire story with the world because it has been one exciting ride.  Like that of a roller coaster, except it started with a free-fall into oblivion and then thirty-five years later took a sharp launch to the healthy shape I'm in today.  I believe my story can inspire and help many others like me who have spent their lives feeling powerless, lost and trapped in their own enforced prisons, trading their freedom for the security of the one sure thing that will never let them down...EATING.  People who have access to the same transforming spirit that I grabbed hold of and harnessed CAN return from a very dark place that I know all too well.

                              


  I would like to tell the world how I lost 185 pounds without surgery or pills and reclaimed my life from a mind-numbing depression.   I finally got a life and am grateful for every lesson  that I learned along the way.  I am very proud of the person I am today.  I have some lessons I would like to share in the form of a self-help book.  I feel so lucky to be alive and enjoying my life and I wish to give the same hope to others.

  However, I'm no different or more special than anyone else.  I have bills to pay and responsibilities to honor that won't take time off while I write this book and attempt to get it published.

 So I am asking for a little help ...to buy some time.  I have been writing my story very slowly in order to make it as complete and accurate as possible.  Now I need the time to finish it.  I believe that my story will help people who are in the same sinking boat that I was in...and I wish to share that story with the public sooner rather than later.  I'm asking for some help for living expenses while I complete it.

  I live pretty frugally, but even so...I will need about $4000 to survive over the next few months while I complete my final draft...and wait for my agent to find a publisher.

              

  How did I lose over half of my body weight in just 18 months without pills or surgery?   You'll have to read the book to find out.  I very much want to share it with you and the entire world!  My final reward will be giving others access to information that may save their life!  Helping others will bring me just as much personal satisfaction as losing the weight itself :)

Link to my profile at ShapeFit.com

  But  I need  a little help to pay my bills and living expenses while I finish writing this book. I basically need just enough for rent, phone and food...nothing more.
 
  I have perks, but the perks are simple because logically...the more complicated they are, the more money I will need to raise in order to fulfill them and have enough left over to serve the purpose of this campaign.  I am extremely grateful for all support I might receive.  I believe it will bring many people the inspiration and help they need in order to succeed with their own weight-loss goals.

  I appreciate any support you are able to provide!  Even if I don't reach my funding goal, everything I receive will go towards living expenses while I finish writing the book. 

Risks & Challenges

  The only real risk I run is not receiving enough funds to continue writing my book within the next few months. I will be writing morning, noon and night (I can easily lose myself in writing such that I have to be reminded to eat).  I am confident that I will finish the book in this time.  It would just be a real inconvenience if my phone service was interrupted in the process.

Other Ways You Can Help

If contributing is something you are unable to do, but you are really interested in my book and would like to one day see it on a bookshelf...you can still help me by spreading the word!

Please post my campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and any other social media that you belong to. Also, word of mouth is another great way to tell people about this project!

Thank you for checking out my campaign - I look forward to paying it forward!

<3 :)

story:
I took the picture above. It is real and untouched. Made of the Light Stuff  is a true story that began its journey during my recovery from the physical and emotional impact of a near death experience, (NDE) brought on by meningitis. My recovery was complicated by the fact that I was trying to understand the apparent incredibility of what I’d experienced during my NDE; I wanted to tell people but was afraid of ridicule, and even though I knew what I had seen was more real than anything I had ever experienced in my life, I didn’t want it reduced to another person's pathetic attempt at explaining away the unexplainable.

Prior to my NDE, I had not been a particularly religious person or believed in reincarnation, and though I have always believed in something, I wasn't quite sure what it actually was. Whenever things went awry, I prayed to a God I wasn’t even sure existed, and nothing I was taught in respect to religion had ever seemed plausible or able to answer any of my questions. The God I learned about always seemed absent in my times of need, and unfortunately, my life has contained a fair amount of trauma and struggle.

Recounting my NDE experience regularly reduces me to tears and it has been a difficult subject for me to either write about, or speak of openly. This is mainly because it's quite challenging to find the correct language to describe an NDE in any way that does it justice – the words in our human language do not exist to describe what it's like when we are no longer human! I am also aware that writing of my experience carries a great sense of responsibility to describe the event as accurately and clearly as possible. 

The impact of my story?

I hope that my story will help people to not only get through seemingly impossible difficulties, such as illness, abuse, the despair of suicide, bullying, death of loved ones, and a near death experience but to see that they can really triumph over them and access their own 'Light Stuff' to live an amazing and inspired life.

I know those of you who have had an NDE will be able to relate completely to what I share in my book, and I hope you will feel some sense of validation and understanding in the knowledge that there is one other person out there who knows what you have been through. For those of you who know of loved ones that have gone through an NDE, I hope that my story helps you to better understand why this kind of experience changes a person irrevocably. 

Now I know that we are all equal; that we are part of something amazing, that our consciousness survives our death, and reincarnation does indeed exist. I saw that one light shines divinely through all living things and through each one of us, connecting everything. I hope my story touches a part of you, that little spark of awareness inside of you that tells you there is more to ‘you’ than who you appear to be in your human form. 

Anyone who has an NDE doesn’t need convincing of the survival of consciousness – they just need the courage to talk about it. Made of the Light Stuff  is my story.    

Carol J King - Author. Sydney, Australia.

How your pledge helps

Funds raised will go towards all aspects of publishing 'Made of the Light Stuff'and getting the story out there, including:

  • Publishing costs for printed formats
  • Creation of all electronic formats, such as Kindle and Amazon
  • Marketing & Website promotion
  • Editing and Proof reading
  • public speaking events

Other Ways You Can Help...

If you can't contribute financially, don't worry, just please let others know about my campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.

The Future? 

After the book is released I will be spreading the word on the survival of consciousness and how we can all be living inspired, amazing and happy lives by Living the Light Stuff.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

‘We are all visitors to this time, this place. We are just passing through. 
Our purpose here is to observe, to learn, to grow, to love… and then we return home.’
                             Australian Aboriginal Proverb

story:
IS a resource for any writer who wants to start gaining resume-worthy writing experience, and is filled with tips and techniques from freelancers making a living with their creative wordplay.

IS crafted with the writing community in mind, will be shaped by your feedback, and written in a common language that employs humor (and illustrations) to reveal actionable knowledge.

IS going to take some time to get just right, but when we get there, you will have been a part of it!


IS NOT a get-rich-quick scheme to make you tons of money with no effort.

IS NOT an advanced guide for turning an already stellar freelancer into a bajillionaire.

IS NOT a step-by-step guide for self-publishing - though it certainly may help!


Why Write This Book?

When I started freelancing, I couldn’t find a guide that was a) relevant to my creative path and timeline, b) was written or explained in an easily-digestible and action-ready format and c) had all of the beginner information I really needed to be successful.

I know that companies and organizations are looking for you and your writing skills and I want to help you gain real-world experience, the best writing samples, and the tools to market yourself as a professional freelance writer ASAP.

I want to fill the gap by creating a beginner’s guide to freelance writing that is a great read, and a great resource for all writers who want to upgrade their creativity to the next level.  I'll be taking all of the information and experience I've gained personally, coupling it with tips and techniques from real digital nomads and freelance writers around the globe, and gathering all the questions the community needs answers to in one place.

                                    

Why $4000?

Any contributions you make - be they financial, informational, or otherwise - are immensely appreciated and will directly impact the creation of From Writer to Freelancer.  

I am just one writer, and it takes a team to create an amazing body of work that is both fun and informative for you.  Each page of From Writer to Freelancer will be full of valuable and actionable information, humor and quick tips, and simple illustrations that make it an enjoyable read.  My goal is to craft a guide that makes it super simple for you to be successful as a freelance writer.

                        

Timeline

It may seem like long time from now until the scheduled delivery in September of 2016, but a lot of love is going into this book.  It’s going to take time to gather interviews from successful digital nomads and freelance writers to get you the best tips.  With all of the incredible feedback this new writing community will have to offer, there will certainly be rewrites.  Plus, I know how the creative mind works, and even though the text will be fun to read - you’re going to need some great graphics and fun illustrations to really amp it up.

A lot has already gone into From Writer to Freelancer and I hope that you will come with me for the rest of the ride.  I can’t wait for the moment when you get to share your story with the community, and help other writers live out their dreams too.


Even MORE Ways To Help!

Friends, writers, and creatives alike, you can help make From Writer to Freelancer a reality.  Take advantage of fun perks like terribly drawn animals on thank-you postcards, a set of Writer's Block Busters cubes to inspire your writing, custom-designed logos for your big launch into freelancing and, of course the book, From Writer to Freelancer!

If you want to help out, and are curious to see some of the other perks I have up my sleeve if we hit this goal, then please:

  • Utilize the Indiegogo share tools and post this bad boy all over your Facebook, Twitter, G+

  • Find me on Instagram @WriterToFreelancer, screenshot the book image and tag all your creative followers

  • Follow this campaign to keep tabs on exactly what’s going down in freelance town

  • Comment with your hopes and dreams, your writing inspiration, your tips for future freelancers, or the first time you called yourself a writer.

                                         

                                         YOU are what companies need right now.  

                   YOU already have the makings to be an amazing freelancer writer.  

                       WE can create the From Writer to Freelancer guide together.

                                            WE can be creative AND earn a living.

                                                  WE just need a place to start.

                                         How About Right Here & Right Now?

Utilize the Indiegogo share tools and post this bad boy all over your Facebook, Twitter, G+
Find me on Instagram @WriterToFreelancer, screenshot the book image and tag all your creative followers
Follow this campaign to keep tabs on exactly what’s going down in freelance town
Comment with your hopes and dreams, your writing inspiration, your tips for future freelancers, or the first time you called yourself a writer.

story:
With a name as large as a nation, América recently recalled a time marked by abuse and violence when she “felt as small as a grain of rice.” Four years ago, América joined La Clínica's Entre Amigas program and became a health promoter to empower other victims of domestic abuse. As a newly appointed Board Member of La Clínica, América sits at a large conference table and fires away questions and ideas.  América amplifies the voices and perspectives of the thousands of patients she represents.  There is nothing small about América – she is a survivor, a woman who regained her health, and she is marching forward to make a difference in her community. She is now finishing nursing school, because she wants to give back to the community."

América is not the only person who once felt as small as a grain of rice. Many of us know what it feels like. The uncertainty, the anxiety, the fear. 

At La Clínica del Pueblo, América found a safe space and friends to help her get through tough times. Today, you can help other woman heal.

Let´s expand our reach. Let´s amplify our voices.

Help us reach our goal of $5000. Even a small donation can make a big impact in the lives of women like América.

Donate. $250 will allow a woman to attend a whole year of workshops and  counseling through Entre Amigas (Among Friends), La Clínica´s Reproductive Health and Domestic Violence Program. How much can you pitch in?

Who we are: La Clínica del Pueblo is a non-profit organization and Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC) in the Washington DC metro area. Over 90% of the patients La Clínica serves live at, or below, poverty level. Individuals are caught in a cycle of working long hours to make poverty-wages; simultaneously, they do not have adequate resources or time to tend to health needs or pay for the transportation needed to get to a health clinic. These ongoing stressors perpetuate health adversities and further block individuals from accessing treatment when needed.

La Clínica provides:

·         primary care services

·         mental health and substance abuse services

·         HIV testing, counseling and referrals

·        on and off site medical interpretations 

·         reproductive health and domestic violence prevention

·         and more.

Today, we need your help to keep providing healthcare services to patients like América, so they can look forward to a better life.

story:
About The Book

For the past 6 years or so I have gathered information about all the Western Australian Alternative bands through the years 1976~1989.  Along the way I have met and interviewed many musicians of the day and was allowed to go through boxes of archives of tapes, cassettes, posters, flyers and much much more. It covers all the name bands that made it and all the bands that didn't.  They are all in here.

The idea of putting it all into a book for all of us to share came after I realised that all these great archives need to be in one place.  Yea, there's the internet but its not the same as holding a nice physical book while lounging back and listening to some music of the period.

Perth in the late 70s until 1989 was a hotbed of fantastic original groups with many going under the radar.  So my job is to bring all these goodies and great memories back to you so you can reminisce with your family and friends.  You can show your kids all weirdos you hung out with and watch them get embarrassed :)

Included is a  CD which will have many previously released and unreleased tracks from the period as well.  The music will knock you out and will surely impress.  Its worth the price alone.

Short Summary

I am close to finishing up and I have decided to put this book up for CROWD FUNDING. The reason for this is to help me determine how many colour pages go inside or not.  The more the better but the more it has the more expensive it will be to print and it will also determine how many books get printed.  Hopefully it goes beyond my expectations.

If I meet the Crowd Funding I need then that's cool - If I don't, then less colour pages it will have but it will still maintain a high quality look and content.

After the CROWD FUND is ended, you can still purchase the book through this page as this will then serve as a pre order, It more or less does already.

Tell you friends and help get this 6 year project in the making, done and dusted.

What Funds Do You Need To Finish This Book?

The target of $10,000 breaks down into the following:

Direct Book Production and Funding Expenses: $8,000

Includes: Editing, Indiegogo-related fees, Book printing and taxes.

CD mastering, manufacturing and packaging: $2000

What Will I Get For My Contribution?

The main gift you will receive is the satisfaction that comes with being a part of this important book project that you can treasure and hand down to future generations.  I'm sure a lot of you that order the book are within the pages and that would be a great thing to show your family as well wouldn't it?

I am offering some great deals to allow you to experience some of this unique decade with me. For each pledge level (ranging from $20 to $50), you will get the items at a Pre Order CROWD FUND discounted price and includes a personal thank you (in the book only) signed by me. 

NOTE:  The CD is exclusive to this campaign only - The CD will NOT be available in shops and only the book will be available at some book stores (if any remain after this campaign) but the RRP will be much higher than $50.

If the entire amount is not funded, I will still use the reached funds as planned to ensure that the book gets published. As I mentioned above the colour content is on the line here - so the closer to my goal the more colour gets onto the pages.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • PLEASE HELP to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools or POST on social media as much as you can.

THANKS ONE AND ALL
story_txt:
About The Book
For the past 6 years or so I have gathered information about all the Western Australian Alternative bands through the years 1976~1989.  Along the way I have met and interviewed many musicians of the day and was allowed to go through boxes of archives of tapes, cassettes, posters, flyers and much much more. It covers all the name bands that made it and all the bands that didn't.  They are all in here.
The idea of putting it all into a book for all of us to share came after I realised that all these great archives need to be in one place.  Yea, there's the internet but its not the same as holding a nice physical book while lounging back and listening to some music of the period.
Perth in the late 70s until 1989 was a hotbed of fantastic original groups with many going under the radar.  So my job is to bring all these goodies and great memories back to you so you can reminisce with your family and friends.  You can show your kids all weirdos you hung out with and watch them get embarrassed :)
Included is a  CD which will have many previously released and unreleased tracks from the period as well.  The music will knock you out and will surely impress.  Its worth the price alone.
Short Summary 
I am close to finishing up and I have decided to put this book up for CROWD FUNDING. The reason for this is to help me determine how many colour pages go inside or not.  The more the better but the more it has the more expensive it will be to print and it will also determine how many books get printed.  Hopefully it goes beyond my expectations.
If I meet the Crowd Funding I need then that's cool - If I don't, then less colour pages it will have but it will still maintain a high quality look and content.
After the CROWD FUND is ended, you can still purchase the book through this page as this will then serve as a pre order, It more or less does already.
Tell you friends and help get this 6 year project in the making, done and dusted.
   
What Funds Do You Need To Finish This Book?
The target of $10,000 breaks down into the following:
Direct Book Production and Funding Expenses: $8,000
Includes: Editing, Indiegogo-related fees, Book printing and taxes.
CD mastering, manufacturing and packaging: $2000


What Will I Get For My Contribution?

The main gift you will receive is the satisfaction that comes with being a part of this important book project that you can treasure and hand down to future generations.  I'm sure a lot of you that order the book are within the pages and that would be a great thing to show your family as well wouldn't it?
I am offering some great deals to allow you to experience some of this unique decade with me. For each pledge level (ranging from $20 to $50), you will get the items at a Pre Order CROWD FUND discounted price and includes a personal thank you (in the book only) signed by me. 
NOTE:  The CD is exclusive to this campaign only - The CD will NOT be available in shops and only the book will be available at some book stores (if any remain after this campaign) but the RRP will be much higher than $50.
If the entire amount is not funded, I will still use the reached funds as planned to ensure that the book gets published. As I mentioned above the colour content is on the line here - so the closer to my goal the more colour gets onto the pages.   
Other Ways You Can Help

 Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  PLEASE HELP to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools or POST on social media as much as you can.   THANKS ONE AND ALL

story:
Suppose

       you lost the memory of most of your words?

    I was a writer. I wrote children's stories. I wrote memoirs. I loved words. I collected words and images and saved them on paper and in my heart.

    On January 4, 2007 I suffered a stroke.

    I lost the memory of most of my words.

    I searched for them everywhere.

   But each time I tried to speak, I got lost and was unable to remember what I was saying.

    I often found myself staring at my feet searching for the words that I knew that I knew.

  8 months after the stroke my doctor told me that “I’ve got what I’ve got” with regards to recovery and not to expect anything more.

    That just wasn’t good enough. I held on to the faith that it could be and would be better. I had no idea how.  It had to be.

       I began to play word games against others in the apps on my phone with the hope that the words would stay. I always lost but played anyway to keep using words.

  I began to take University classes on-line. I called it exercise for my brain. I was unable to remember what I had just read but I still pursued it.

      I finally joined a writing group and sat there, and sat there, and sat there.

          I thought that maybe the words would find me and sink in.  I sat there for nearly 2 years before I wrote a word.

     During the third year, I began to take notes so that if I remembered ideas and words, I would not forget them when I needed them.

    I became hopeful. If I wasn’t able to remember my words, I wanted to find a way to still be able to use them.

    After 8 years and a lot of hard work, I have now collected enough words and written a novel entitled “Ever. After.”

     Please join me and become a part of my publishing journey of a book that almost never happened.

        My novel “Ever. After.” has been inspired by my personal journey. It is my hope that both my personal story, and “Ever. After.” might inspire others to have the faith to pursue their dreams; even when events are not in their favor, even when they are told they “can’t”.

  

Who am I?

Hello. My name is Rebecca Friedman. "Ever. After." is my first novel.

I was a writer who suffered a stroke in 2007 at the age of 43 and lost the memory of most of my words.  Throughout my recovery I have set small goals which at the time seemed unattainable. As I reached them or missed a few, I set new ones. I was not sure about how, but I promised myself I would find my words again and write a book. I was fully prepared to forgive myself when I couldn’t keep my promise, but after 8 years of very hard work I have completed the manuscript for my novel “Ever. After.” In finding my words I was able to get a piece of myself back that I thought was lost forever.

"Ever.After."  the novel is an original, compelling, and intimate journey of love, family, and recovery from a stroke. It is the story of a woman who becomes an unlikely hero when she believes she has lost everything and in her journey finds herself.


 

Why contribute to my campaign?

In contributing to my campaign you will not only be assisting me in reaching another goal; the goal of publishing my book and having my words read.   You will also be helping me show others who have had strokes, or chronic illnesses, or who have simply lost hope that with perseverance, focus, faith and a positive attitude: they can have the courage of their convictions, overcome obstacles, and realize their dreams.  They can laugh again, and finally they should never give up.

 

How your contribution will help: 

With the funds collected from this campaign I plan to finish the preparation for publishing, as well as publish and promote my novel “Ever. After.” 

Included will be: a final professional copy and content edit (it has already been professionally edited twice), formatting, cover-art and cover design, a website, the actual publishing of e books and paperbacks, printing, shipping, as well as promotions, and readings.

Also included in the goal funds are the fees for Indiegogo and credit card services.

Any funds collected above the campaign target will go to the creation of an audiobook, as well as further promotion, and readings.


 

 

 The perks offered in for this campaign include opportunities to donate books to libraries or hospitals in your name, as well as a unique opportunity to name a character in my book “Ever. After.”

They perks offered are mainly contingent upon the publishing launch date - which due to variables beyond my control is subject to change. Currently I am aiming for September 2015.

Other ways you can help:

If you would like to contribute but are unable to do so financially  - here is how you can help…and yes it will really help.

Please share this campaign. You can share the link with your friends on Facebook and Twitter, and ask them to share it as well.

Thank you again for your help,

Rebecca

story:
I've done the math and it looks like the highest advance paid per word published is just under $100 per word. Thus, I am seeking to raise $2,100 so that I can publish my own tome of 21 words and receive kind and generous assistance from all of you to fund my advance. If I go over the goal, I'll get to create and share more beautiful content!

At present, I am a humble public servant with big dreams and ideas that I'm working on from more books to life-saving inventions. I'm hoping that this present effort helps to drive forward the rest of my efforts. Plus, it'll be fun! Wouldn't you like to say that you know the world's highest paid author? 

I'll track my efforts on www.BigtimeAuthor.com once this campaign is through.

story:
Summary

My name is Njomza (Ney-omza, it means "Blossom" in Albanian) and I am a child of war. When I was five years old my country was invaded and my parents and three siblings were forced out of our peaceful village. In the following months I was shot at, survived a death train, watched my father being beaten and shot as he tried unsuccessfully to prevent me from being abducted. And that's just the beginning. We eventually made it to the USA and I began the long, painful journey to recovery but not without going through the Second War that many refugee children face -- horrendous bullying, abuse, hardship, PTSD and depression. Just leaving a conflict zone and coming to the USA wasn't enough. It was  a very hard adaptation to life in a very generous but nonetheless foreign country. But I have found the answers, through my own experience, extensive study and some amazing mentoring, and these are shared in my book.


Now I am on a mission to raise awareness about children of war, what they face on the battlefields, and what they need  not just to survive but thrive. Please come and join me to make my dream a reality. Save a child and turn a refugee into a hero, a survivor into a contributor.


Refugee children of war are a critical issue. As I write this, there are wars going on in different parts of the world affecting many, many children with no end in sight. In fact, there are an estimated two million childhood war refugees from Syria alone. Some of these children are orphaned and those lucky enough to have families have parents and siblings scarred by horror and experiencing PTSD.  It's one thing to give food, shelter and water but those are short-term solutions. What about the future of these children? We can help them not only survive but thrive in the long term.


This is a global issue. Those lucky enough to escape zones of conflict can end up in many different countries all around the world. There are children in your classrooms, neighbors on your street, and people struggling in your countries who can be helped to overcome the trauma of a destroyed childhood.


Where Does the Money Go?

My book Blossom: Confessions of a Child of War is a start. I want it to be a platform that will raise awareness of the child refugee cause. The money will go to finalizing the book and promotion which will hopefully then provide a platform for support,  information and services for those in need and those trying to help children of war. These scarred and battered children may seem like lost refugees but I believe that inside many of them are scientists, poets, writers,  doctors, nurses and healers -- if we can only give them the chance. We need to give them the real opportunity to recover from trauma and develop their gifts: to blossom. They did not ask for the horrors that they have endured.


Impact

By supporting my book project and helping me spread awareness about how to really serve the long term needs of war-affected children, you will not just be helping this child of war but potentially thousands and thousands of child war refugees. These people need all the help they can get. They have lost everything -- their homes, their childhood, any sense of stability. If you go online you can see the photos: destroyed parents holding up photos of lost children,  pre-teens with mangled bodies, toddlers lying besides the graves of their parents and siblings. Believe me, I'm not being melodramatic. I've been there. There are ways of preventing the horrors of their childhood becoming their predominant life theme.


Challenges

There will no doubt be challenges but one of the things that I have learned about childhood war survivors -- we're a resilient bunch. Just give me a chance and I will do everything I can to promote this cause. You see, I will always first and foremost be a child of war and I know what that means. I also know what it takes to use those experiences and turn them into a life passion and a force for the most noble profession -- helping others. I also have an outstanding team of caring professionals who can help raise awareness of my book and the bigger issues it raises,.


Other Ways to Help

Please help me build my platform by promoting this book. Whether you can donate money or not, please spread the word via your network.  There are millions of children suffering and your efforts might help turn someone like me, from a traumatized kidnapped lost 5 year-old into an author, healer and, I hope, inspiration. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.




Perks and Thanks

$25 donation: ebook

$26- 250 donation: Signed copy of paper book

$251- 499 donation: Acknowledgement of your generosity in the book itself

$500+ donation: Personal mention in social media posts and my personal recognition and gratitude to you as someone who cares about children whose lives have been devastated by war.


Team:

Njomza Kryeziu, Author

Howard J. Rankin PhD, Writer, Promoter, Co-author

Elias Sander, International Media Manager

Dottie Dehart, Publicist, USA


Goal: $10,000

story:
Hi, there!

I’m a full time vanlifer, street performer, and YOUR bubble lady! I've been traveling around for the past two years, popping up in public spaces to share bubble playtime with everyone!

Now, I've compiled all of my best "secrets" to wonder-filled bubble playtime (including my giant bubble recipe) in a handmade zine! I wrote and illustrated the whole darn thing and I think you're going to LOVE it!

The funds raised from this campaign will go to essential repairs to my van-home, so I can keep bubbling! This campaign will also help me weather the storm of social-distancing and quarantine.

The Good

  • The Bubble Zine is a digital eBook! And it's already complete and ready for your loving arms! You'll receive your copy (almost) instantly! I'll be emailing backers individually, but I will do my best to send your copy asap!

  • If you've ever tried corn syrup or glycerin recipes and been disappointed that your mega bubbles dreams weren't fulfilled... I can't wait to delight you with my recipe! :)

  • As a street performer, playtime is ALWAYS donation based, so everyone can participate! With my indiegogo campaign, I've decided to keep playtime accessible. You can donate ANY amount and you'll receive my zine. I know that every dollar is precious, and I appreciate your support SO MUCH. Like... crying-face-prayer-hands-heart emoji I REALLY appreciate you!

The Bad (sort of)

My van is an air-cooled 1982 Volkswagen Vanagon Westfalia BABE. Her body is in great shape and she's almost completely original! This gives her +100 cool points, but -75 safety points. I have driven her slowly and gently always, but now her (near 40 year old!) parts are showing signs of wear that mean imminent danger (or total engine failure) if I don't get them fixed soon!

My van's woes:

  • Her engine is leaking oil at a rate that makes any kind of distance driving dangerous, because she'll nearly run dry between gas stations. This causes her engine to overheat, which could cause my engine to catch on fire! A host of curious (and dangerous) engine problems has my mechanic recommending a full replacement of her engine.
  • Leaking transmission fluid! And a terrible problem with her differential which needs to be addressed so that I don't lose control while driving.
  • Basically every part of her suspension needs to be replaced, including tie rods, ball joints, springs and shocks. I'm safe for the moment, but the warning cracks and signs are signaling to my mechanic that the clock is ticking on this issue!
  • I also want to take this opportunity to address a few other safety issues, including replacing the spare tire, fixing my currently non-functioning emergency brake, and upgrading to LED lights for increased nighttime visibility.

MORE GOOD!

I have an amazing mechanic that I know and trust and has done great, thoughtful work for me in the past. Doing all of this work at ONCE will save me so much time and money! This work will keep me rolling SAFELY! And I have friends who've already offered me a place to stay while my van spends six weeks in surgery!

The Unknown

My mechanic won't know the extent of the transmission problems until he has already opened it up, so I might have to wait on some optional safety upgrades and preventative maintenance. However, if I meet my goal, I will definitely be able to cover the cost of repairs!

Other Ways You Can Help

I know everyone can't contribute financially, but these are other ways you can help!

  • Share! Social media shares are so helpful, hooray!!
  • Speak to one (or ten) people *directly* about my campaign! People are much more likely to respond to your personal, direct message than a public post.

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

As I made the promotional video for this indiegogo campaign, I went through years worth of candid phone pictures and videos I've collected. Let me tell you the truth right here, right now... I UGLY CRIED WITH THE OVERWHELM OF LOVE IN MY HEART! YOU all have shown up in the biggest, realest, most magical ways and made bubbling everything that it is. I literally couldn't do this without you. Thank you for inspiring me with hope for humanity. All I can say is that I haven't had my fill of this magical work. I know we're going to reach this goal together, and I can't WAIT to keep rolling. :)

All my Love and Kindest Regards,

Linda Bubbles

I have an amazing mechanic that I know and trust and has done great, thoughtful work for me in the past. Doing all of this work at ONCE will save me so much time and money! This work will keep me rolling SAFELY! And I have friends who've already offered me a place to stay while my van spends six weeks in surgery!

The Unknown
My mechanic won't know the extent of the transmission problems until he has already opened it up, so I might have to wait on some optional safety upgrades and preventative maintenance. However, if I meet my goal, I will definitely be able to cover the cost of repairs!

Other Ways You Can Help
I know everyone can't contribute financially, but these are other ways you can help!

Share! Social media shares are so helpful, hooray!!
Speak to one (or ten) people *directly* about my campaign! People are much more likely to respond to your personal, direct message than a public post.

THANK YOU SO MUCH!As I made the promotional video for this indiegogo campaign, I went through years worth of candid phone pictures and videos I've collected. Let me tell you the truth right here, right now... I UGLY CRIED WITH THE OVERWHELM OF LOVE IN MY HEART! YOU all have shown up in the biggest, realest, most magical ways and made bubbling everything that it is. I literally couldn't do this without you. Thank you for inspiring me with hope for humanity. All I can say is that I haven't had my fill of this magical work. I know we're going to reach this goal together, and I can't WAIT to keep rolling. :)All my Love and Kindest Regards,Linda Bubbles

story:
Toad Springs #2: Moonshine, Mushrooms, and a Girl Called Bob

In 2013, indie publisher Grey Gecko Press released a whimsical, homespun and charming short story anthology by Susan Adger about a small Florida town called Toad Springs, set in the 1930s. Readers immediately fell in love with the down-home feel of Seashells, Gator Bones, and the Church of Everlasting Liability, and this humorous and often all-too-relatable collection of stories has since brightened hundreds of homes and bookshelves.

Now Susan is back with the next set of tales from Toad Springs! The new book is jam-packed with even more witticisms, craziness, and henna hair dye than you can shake a stick at! All your favorite characters make their appearances in all the ways you expect, and all-new characters introduce themselves, expanding the circle of stories.

Written with the wit and charm that can only come from living through these stories, Tampa Bay-area resident Susan Adger brings us back to the 1930s in 'country' Florida!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Grey Gecko Press, like most small presses, operates on a small budget, and we need your help to make the biggest splash we can for these new stories! We're setting an initial fundraising goal of just $2,500 - and here's how we'll split that up:

  • $250: Cover art for the new book
  • $105: Copyright, print setup
  • $600: Professional 3-stage editing
  • $1,300: Printing costs for pledge fulfillment
  • $245: Indiegogo and miscellaneous fees

 

Pledges earn lots of great perks and rewards!

  • Trade paperback and hardcover editions of Moonshine & Mushrooms
  • eBook bundles from Grey Gecko Press (including our full 45-book catalog!)
  • Trade paperback and hardcover editions of Seashells & Gator Bones
  • New cover art for Seashells & Gator Bones (Stretch Goal #1)
  • Trade paperback and hardcover editions of The Toad Springs Omnibus (working title, Stretch Goals #2 & 3)

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any campaign, our main risk is not reaching our full funding goal. We're mitigating that risk by progressing with the project in stages, as we meet each funding goal. For example: once we've raised $600, we'll get our editors to work turning the manuscript into a polished gem. With the next $250, we'll commission artwork for the new book, using the website DesignCrowd.com - a site we've used to great positive effect in the past with other projects. Then it's on copyrights, print setup, and the printing costs (by far the largest portion).

This " progress" prevents us from getting a 'half-finished' project and instead allows us to manage both our goals and use the generated funds in the most efficient and effective fashion.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even the smallest amount helps, but we also know that times are hard for everyone out there, and as we say in our Gecko family: family comes first. But you can still help! Just mash that Share button, talk to your friends, let as many people as you can know that we've got a great book to show them, we just need a little help to get it across the finish line.

story:
Story of My Book

Entrepreneurship is typically considered extracurricular during middle school and even high school years. While some curricula provide opportunities for students to learn requisite business skills, the piecemeal approach lacks direction. This practical toolkit is designed to transform young aspirants to future business leaders. The book adopts an innovative framework to force readers to apply the acquired skills in a progressive manner and document the journey along the way. Entrepreneurship is all about doing and this unique book is bound to produce doers.

What We Need & What You Get

We are running this campaign to raise money to cover publishing costs.

Besides the satisfaction of bringing this much needed book to light, you may avail the special promotion pricing and/or volume discounts. If opting for a paperback edition, you will receive a personally signed copy of our book when published.

About The Authors

Sruthi Rayaprolu is a rising senior with diverse experience as an entrepreneur and is passionate about applying ingenuity to solve everyday problems with a global impact. In building companies ground up, she has been a true trail blazer who amassed practical experience and critical business insights. Owing to her credentials, she got opportunities to teach large groups of students and perfected the magic recipe to inspire the young minds. She is quite adept at attaching a sense of purpose to keep the entrepreneurial wheel rolling.

Ujjayi Pamidigantam is a rising senior with a successful track record in integrating technology, biomedical sciences and entrepreneurship. She had put forward award-winning products and solutions at many entrepreneurship events, medical hackathons and delivered presentations at prestigious forums. Her main area of entrepreneurial focus is creating medical devices which enhance health conditions of underprivileged population. She views entrepreneurship as a self-empowerment tool for young students and eager to share her knowledge, skills and experience.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our pre-sale campaign with your family, friends, and network.

We deeply appreciate your support.

Sruthi & Ujjayi

story:
Mockingbird Publishing is launching a new book in tough times

 

With the start of this year, we were honored to be chosen by a group of writers to publish this anthology.  Cin Sado Noir marks our entry to publishing in the area of Arts and Culture.  The book is a wonderful fit for us.  This book allows us to do what we have always done, both through our flagship periodical and our book publishing arm, which is bring unique perspectives and under reported facts to broad conversations about key issues facing our global society.

Discussion of  sexuality and sadomasochism, though taboo, is something touches every life on Earth, with the exception of single cellular life forms, who also do not read. By launching this book, we hope to bring unique perspectives and context to a broad audience.

The Help we are asking for:

We are looking to raise  $5000 in order to finance a marketing blitz over the next two months.

In the publishing industry, the profile of any book is often set within the first couple of weeks of it's initial release to the general public.  That profile is raised and expanded through marketing to industry insiders in order to get book buyers to notice a publication.

Small independent booksellers and large wholesalers have many titles competing for their attention and stocking.  For the bibliophile and the casual book consumer alike, there is great competition, both by established industry gatekeepers and through algorithms for attention.

We are asking you for a small leg up on this project.  Through our intensive study and publishing on the intelligence community we are no strangers to information warfare. As alternative media a commitment to waging that struggle asymmetrically was part of our inception.

On May 10th, the book will be released to the broadest possible audience.  We want to reach that date with a great deal of buzz generated. 

To this end we have books in stock, which are one of the perks you can receive with a donation. We also have T-shirts featuring art from the book and condoms with the same art on the wrapper as items that you can wear proudly to generate conversation about this book.

A $10 contribution will get you a condom mailed to you at the address you provide.

We have books in stock and we sell them for $24.95 on our website now. However a contribution of $30 will get you both a copy of the book and a condom (while supplies last on the latter) at the address you provide.

A $60 contribution will get you 1 book, 1 condom and 1 T-shirt (again while supplies last). Please specify men's or women's t-shirts and size.

How your help in turn helps us:

Mockingbird Publishing has taken unique looks at under-reported stories and under-discussed topics for 6 years now.

This little bit of help is a big boost to us.  It also allows us to give you a physical item (like the book) that you can show or wear (like the shirts or condom).

The are many films in many languages that are reviewed and discussed in this anthology. Armed with this new knowledge, you have new ways to explore your desires, and discuss them with a friend or friends.

This is a book of conversations. Our aim is to stimulate more stimulating conversation. 

This is a new challenge for us

Publishing is a small world dominated by giants.  With this book, Mockingbird now launched 5 titles in 6 years.  However we are still a David in a world of tall men in armor.

There is a chance that despite your help, this may not be the sling bullet that strikes home.  But that does not decrease our faith or determination.

Other ways you can help

Even if you were not sufficiently stimulated by the government recently or every condom you come into the possession of is not going to be the topic of a long conversation, there are ways you can help us:

Share this fundraiser.  Somebody you know wants to see this book out there in the world, wants to raise awareness of the under-known films it discusses or supports independent authors and publishers.

Tell you friends about this book.  Help us generate the buzz.  Asymmetrical marketing means help comes from people like you who are excited to see writers and small presses succeed.

story:
Welcome to the Florida Writers Project

For the past 10 years, Wordier Than Thou has connected Florida writers and readers in fun, offbeat ways, whether it's through immersive theater projects or drag and burlesque shows or themed storytelling events. 

Now, we want to publish the work of Florida authors. We're raising funds for our first publishing project, Tennessee Murder Ballad, the debut novel of Heather Jones.

The COVID-19 pandemic pushed back our publication timeline for Tennessee Murder Ballad, but we're back on track and plan to release it this summer. Pre-order your copy today!

About Tennessee Murder Ballad

In April 1848, preacher Paul Crane rides into a lonesome Appalachian town and kills Ellen Bridges, a widow whose music he believes to be witchcraft, by throwing her into a well. A group of children, including her grandson, Carter, push him in after her to avenge her murder. As the preacher disappears into the darkness, he curses the children, the town, and the mountains where they live.

Eight of the children grow up to survive the American Civil War only to re-encounter the preacher’s curse. But the music and love of Ellen Bridges have also survived in the mountains. During four days in April 1866, as the moon waxes full, a sinister circus appears on Ellen’s former property, and a fire rages down the mountain, each of the remaining children, now adults, meets their destiny of redemption, or death.

What Readers Are Saying

“If Zora Neale Hurston, Stephen Crane, Toni Morrison, and Annie Proulx started an a cappella group specializing in haunting love songs in five-part harmony—the fifth part being the ghost note—and you were lucky enough to listen, you might be able to imagine some of the power of Heather Jones’s novel Tennessee Murder Ballad.”

           —Jill Kelly Koren, author of Though the Word is a Lie

“Layering folklore and magical realism against the bleak, poverty-stricken backdrop of rural Appalachia post-Civil War, Heather Jones writes with a talent and historical perspective that is astounding.”

                    —Kimberly Lojewski, author of Worm Fiddling Nocturne in the Key of a Broken Heart

“…a multi-voiced, Faulknerian investigation of one horrible day in Sinking Springs…Jones’ style is as direct and earthy as the ballads she references, making Tennessee Murder Ballad an easy read in one way, a spooky and challenging one in another. Magical, Freudian Southern Gothic at its finest!”

                                                       —David Brendan Hopes, author of The Falls of the Wyona

About the Author

Heather Jones is a playwright, educator, and poet based in St. Petersburg, Florida. Follow her on Facebook.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to pre-order your copy of Tennessee Murder Ballad or want to help us spread the word, please share this fundraiser with your book-loving friends!

Also, follow Wordier Than Thou and the Florida Writers Project on Facebook

story:
Resumen

Y si cambiamos la manera de leer un libro a un niño/a?? Esta historia fue escrita y diseñada para ayudar nuestros pequeños a perder pequeños miedos que les frena en sus grandes avances, en su desarrollo por el conocimiento del mundo, y fue creado en base a la historia real que vivimos con mi hijo menor, que permitió que personajes ficticios invadieran nuestra casa, por su gran imaginación y que con un simple juego, reforzamos su valentía, su seguridad, y... funcionó!!! 

 

Trabajé muchos años con niños de todas las edades, de diferentes ámbitos familiaries, educación, niños sobre-protegidos y niños que quizás merecían más atención como niños que son, muchas veces a falta de atención, cariño, desfavorecidos, que podía sentir más inseguros y que por tanto su comportamiento se veía reflejado..  Pero no podemos juzgar sus progenitores, ya que era una simple observación como madre que soy. 

Pero es un factor importante que me empujó a crear un libro en el que mi objetivo es convertir un momento especial del cuento de la noche. Alargar una historia llena de sorpresas, dónde padres y niños necesitan unirse para afrontar juntos emociones, crear el suspense del descubrimiento, vivir una complicidad para afrontar, jugando y aprendiendo, a superar el miedo a lo desconocido, con la imaginación ser capaces de alcanzar cualquier reto!!!

 

Conocí una diseñadora gráfica increíble que digitalizó todo mi trabajo, y un representante y asesor magnífico que está pendiente de recibir el proyecto para imprimirlo, todo está listo, las características bien estudiadas  del material final solo esperan  el pago del presupuesto..  y ahí está mi limitación económica..  el presupuesto que necesito alcanzar a través de todos ustedes es para que una vez alcanzado en tres semanas pueda entregarles y presentarles mi gran sueño que deseo compartir!!! 

La idea es presentarla personalmente a las familias, a través de las bibliotecas, colegios, hospitales, eventos infantiles y cualquier lugar donde los menores puedan disfrutar de la experiencia con sus padres!!! 

 

¿estaría listo para colaborar?

 

 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Tengo mucha gente que ya les interesa y desean ver terminado el proyecto.

El presupuesto de la imprenta es de 3000 € para la impresión y el envío a canarias. Las recaudaciones irán exclusivamente para este último paso, en el qué incluye igualmente vuestras recompensas por el aporte económico que podáis hacerme llegar y formar parte de todo este gran proyecto que espero que les guste porque la sonrisa de un niño y volver a formar parte de su aprendizaje por la vida a pesar qué nuestros trabajos nuestros problemas el día a día las obligaciones no siempre nos permiten dedicar el tiempo que quisiéramos a nuestros pequeños. Padres madres familiares educadores y cuidadores este libro también va dedicado a ustedes porque el momento que compartierais con ellos será una experiencia que viviréis juntos divertida y llena de sorpresas!!! 

 ver un niño feliz, es lo más gratificante que podamos alcanzar en este mundo

 

Quisiera añadir igualmente qué una manera muy grande de ayudar no solo tiene que ser la parte económica compartan con las personas a las que crean que les pueda interesar, y con tan solo ver vuestro paso por esta página vuestro apoyo en la página de Facebook cualquier comentario que aportáis sugerencias o ideas siempre serán bienvenidas porque también de los fallos se aprende y siendo nueva en este mundo increíble de la lectura , de la escritura, será un aporte cultural iProfesional que sabe valorar gracias a todos por favor cualquier duda pónganse en contacto conmigo. 

 

En las secciones siguientes verán que las recompensas varían según el aporte económico no olviden pedirme la dedicación personalizada si lo deseais en todo el territorio español el envío es gratis por lo tanto y confiando en esta increíble página de Crowfunding, deseo llegar a todas las familias posibles!!!! 

 

 si alguna organización pueda estar interesada en conocer mi libro y la idea principal de su proyecto les invito a ponerse en contacto conmigo igualmente que sí consigo lanzar este libro al público me pueda permitir espero a ayudar asociaciones sin ánimo de lucro que hacen todo lo que sea por el bienestar de los menores y repito sería un placer conocerles!!! Y si me aporte de cualquier forma pueda ayudarles en vuestra gran tarea será otro logro alcanzado como madre y persona. 

 

  • MIL GRACIAS A TODOS USTEDES, APORTAR, COMPARTIR , COMOARTIRLO MUUCHOOOO CUANTA MAS PERSONAS LO VEA QUIZAS ANTES ALCANCEMOS ESTE RETO, ESTE SUEÑO!!! JUNTOS!!! 

CONTACTEN CONMIGO SIN COMPROMISO NINGUNO, EN CUALQUIER MOMENTO, LES PUEDO MANDAR TAMBIEN EL ENLACE POR WHATSAPP PARA LLEGAR A TODOSS!!!! 

GRACIAS POR LAS APORTACIONES QUE YA ME ESTAN MANDANDO, LOS MENSAJES DE APOYO, ME HACEN SENTIR FUERTE Y SEGURA , MAS QUE NUNCA ESTE LIBRO PODRA SER REAL, TENERLO EN NUESTRAS MANOS Y EMPEZAR LA AVENTURA CON LOS MAS PEQUES QUE SE LO MERECEN TODO!!!!

Trabajé muchos años con niños de todas las edades, de diferentes ámbitos familiaries, educación, niños sobre-protegidos y niños que quizás merecían más atención como niños que son, muchas veces a falta de atención, cariño, desfavorecidos, que podía sentir más inseguros y que por tanto su comportamiento se veía reflejado..  Pero no podemos juzgar sus progenitores, ya que era una simple observación como madre que soy. 
Pero es un factor importante que me empujó a crear un libro en el que mi objetivo es convertir un momento especial del cuento de la noche. Alargar una historia llena de sorpresas, dónde padres y niños necesitan unirse para afrontar juntos emociones, crear el suspense del descubrimiento, vivir una complicidad para afrontar, jugando y aprendiendo, a superar el miedo a lo desconocido, con la imaginación ser capaces de alcanzar cualquier reto!!!
 
Conocí una diseñadora gráfica increíble que digitalizó todo mi trabajo, y un representante y asesor magnífico que está pendiente de recibir el proyecto para imprimirlo, todo está listo, las características bien estudiadas  del material final solo esperan  el pago del presupuesto..  y ahí está mi limitación económica..  el presupuesto que necesito alcanzar a través de todos ustedes es para que una vez alcanzado en tres semanas pueda entregarles y presentarles mi gran sueño que deseo compartir!!! 
La idea es presentarla personalmente a las familias, a través de las bibliotecas, colegios, hospitales, eventos infantiles y cualquier lugar donde los menores puedan disfrutar de la experiencia con sus padres!!! 
 
¿estaría listo para colaborar?   Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes Tengo mucha gente que ya les interesa y desean ver terminado el proyecto.
El presupuesto de la imprenta es de 3000 € para la impresión y el envío a canarias. Las recaudaciones irán exclusivamente para este último paso, en el qué incluye igualmente vuestras recompensas por el aporte económico que podáis hacerme llegar y formar parte de todo este gran proyecto que espero que les guste porque la sonrisa de un niño y volver a formar parte de su aprendizaje por la vida a pesar qué nuestros trabajos nuestros problemas el día a día las obligaciones no siempre nos permiten dedicar el tiempo que quisiéramos a nuestros pequeños. Padres madres familiares educadores y cuidadores este libro también va dedicado a ustedes porque el momento que compartierais con ellos será una experiencia que viviréis juntos divertida y llena de sorpresas!!! 
 ver un niño feliz, es lo más gratificante que podamos alcanzar en este mundo
 
Quisiera añadir igualmente qué una manera muy grande de ayudar no solo tiene que ser la parte económica compartan con las personas a las que crean que les pueda interesar, y con tan solo ver vuestro paso por esta página vuestro apoyo en la página de Facebook cualquier comentario que aportáis sugerencias o ideas siempre serán bienvenidas porque también de los fallos se aprende y siendo nueva en este mundo increíble de la lectura , de la escritura, será un aporte cultural iProfesional que sabe valorar gracias a todos por favor cualquier duda pónganse en contacto conmigo. 
 
En las secciones siguientes verán que las recompensas varían según el aporte económico no olviden pedirme la dedicación personalizada si lo deseais en todo el territorio español el envío es gratis por lo tanto y confiando en esta increíble página de Crowfunding, deseo llegar a todas las familias posibles!!!! 
  si alguna organización pueda estar interesada en conocer mi libro y la idea principal de su proyecto les invito a ponerse en contacto conmigo igualmente que sí consigo lanzar este libro al público me pueda permitir espero a ayudar asociaciones sin ánimo de lucro que hacen todo lo que sea por el bienestar de los menores y repito sería un placer conocerles!!! Y si me aporte de cualquier forma pueda ayudarles en vuestra gran tarea será otro logro alcanzado como madre y persona.  

MIL GRACIAS A TODOS USTEDES, APORTAR, COMPARTIR , COMOARTIRLO MUUCHOOOO CUANTA MAS PERSONAS LO VEA QUIZAS ANTES ALCANCEMOS ESTE RETO, ESTE SUEÑO!!! JUNTOS!!! 
CONTACTEN CONMIGO SIN COMPROMISO NINGUNO, EN CUALQUIER MOMENTO, LES PUEDO MANDAR TAMBIEN EL ENLACE POR WHATSAPP PARA LLEGAR A TODOSS!!!! 
GRACIAS POR LAS APORTACIONES QUE YA ME ESTAN MANDANDO, LOS MENSAJES DE APOYO, ME HACEN SENTIR FUERTE Y SEGURA , MAS QUE NUNCA ESTE LIBRO PODRA SER REAL, TENERLO EN NUESTRAS MANOS Y EMPEZAR LA AVENTURA CON LOS MAS PEQUES QUE SE LO MERECEN TODO!!!!

story:
"When Life Hands You Cactuses, Make Margaritas" highlights my life's journey and the many ups and downs I have experienced - from the day I was born as a child of war in Lebanon through today, a 42-year-old mom living with the deadly Stage 4, Metastatic Breast Cancer.

My story is about experiencing war as a child, fleeing Lebanon on a smugglers boat, being an immigrant in Sweden, my fight for female independence from the patriarchal and conservative home I grew up in, my three love stories, my heartbreak, my longing for a child, my struggle with infertility, my surviving breast cancer twice by the age of 30 only to receive a death sentence at 37, my fun, successful career and how I achieved my dreams in the male-dominated tech industry, and how and how after 15 years of trying I became a mother at last. It's about my joy and passion for living life like there is no tomorrow and like I’m gonna live forever.

Throughout the years I’ve learned how to handle these challenges, survive and thrive from them, instead of laying down and giving up. I'm therefore including my 8 Ingredient Margarita Recipe on how to overcome challenges and thrive in life.

Find the table of content with all the 30 chapters, including the margarita ingredients below.

So, why am I writing a book about my life? This book is for me, my son, and it’s for you. Me, because I need to cherish and celebrate the life I have had and still have before it is taken from me. My son, because he will most likely lose me way too soon. I believe hearing my story in my words will help him face and manage his grief. And you, because maybe, just maybe, you will find inspiration from my journey and ways to handle your own challenges in life.

Lots of love,
Adiba Barney

PS: 10% of the profits goes to METAvivor, a 501(c)(3) that raises and grants 100% of the funds to Metastatic Breast Cancer Research. Research that will help us live longer, and see our babies grow up. The rest of the profits are put in a fund for my son to donate to MBC projects after I pass away.

Table of Contents

Foreword

Preface

Prologue

Why Cactuses and Margaritas?

Margarita Ingredient: Resilience

1. Child of War: Where did my Childhood Go?

2. Refugees: The Most Advanced Hide and Seek Game Ever!

3. Sweden: The Land of Peace and Snow

4. Home: Go Back to Where you Came From!

5. Culture Shock: Living by the Patriarchal Rules

6. I’m Free: Female Independence at Last

7. My First Company: Becoming an Entrepreneur

Margarita Ingredient: Unfuckwithable

8. The Tech Generation: The Start of a Successful Career

9. First Big Love: Marrying the Man of my Dreams

10. Make a Baby: The Intense Longing for a Child Begins

Margarita Ingredient: Confidence

11. Breast Cancer Strike 1: But I’m Only 27 Years Old

12. 30 and Divorced: What Just Happened?

13. 30 is the New 20

14. Breast Cancer Strike 2: That Didn’t Last Long

15. Second Big Love: My Knight in Shining Armor

16. Chemo Sucks: Let’s Make it Fun

17. Bored: Let’s Start a Company

18. USA Take 3: Fulfilling the American Dream

19. Silicon Valley: Life and Career on Steroids

Margarita Ingredient: Love

20. Third and Biggest Love Yet: Marriage Take 2

21. Let’s Have a Baby! Come on, Give me a Fucking Break!!!

22. Breast Cancer Strike 3: Sentenced to Death at 37

23. Metastatic Breast Cancer and Me: How do You Even Live With This?

Margarita Ingredient: Change

24. Three Frozen Embryos: There is Still Hope in a Freezer

25. Memory Bank Overload: Travels and Fun with Loved Ones

Margarita Ingredient: Empowerment

26. Leaving a Dent: Making an Impact

27. Surrogacy: The Pursuit of the Perfect Womb to Carry our Child

Margarita Ingredient: Hope

28. A Hairy Child is Born

29. Suburbia Here we Come: Leaving my Old Identity Behind Margarita

Ingredient: Fear

30. Living Life Like There is no Tomorrow and Like I’m Gonna Live Forever… Which one is it?

Acknowledgements

20 Facts About Metastatic Breast Cancer

The book is published in Oct, 2020 on Amazon for paperback print, and e-book. You can pre-order e-book here:

story:
Ladies and Gentlemen,

thank you so much for visiting our Indiegogo campaign for my thrilling new novel, The Unnamed Black Book.

I’m Varick Addler, and I’m proud to say that The Unnamed Black Book is already being called “the next Lord of the Rings”.

It’s a tale so powerful, so thrilling, so moving…

As soon as you finish, I know you’ll want to read it again right away!

The Unnamed Black Book is completely finished, and I know you’re going to love the ending.

I’m here on Indiegogo to raise the funds I need to self-publish…

Including professional editing, the book-cover and other publishing costs.

So if you’re looking for a story you can really dive into…

Please, check out all of my campaign perks…

Including our Ring-of-Perfection…

And help me bring the next great sci-fi fantasy novel to bookshelves everywhere.

Thank you so much for your interest, support and generosity!

Thanks & lovely hug,

-Varick Addler

Come with me on an incredible, post-apocalyptic journey with Marie, a woman who is so much more than she seems.

Tasked with saving the very human race itself, Marie must find the 7 Crowns, and rescue the Rings of Power.

With them, she can save mankind…

Or use them to bring her beloved sons back from the dead.

But she cannot do both!

Will Marie return the Rings to their rightful place, saving millions…

Or will she bring her boys back, and see her unholy actions allow Satan to once again rule the earth!

I hope I’ve hooked you with that little passage.  (smile)

 

 

 

Hello, my name is Varick Addler and I am the author of an incredible new book: The Unnamed Black Book.  This book will take you on a wild ride of choice through a post-apocalyptic setting.  Many will be able to relate to the choices that the main character has to make, while we don’t have to choose between saving the world or our family.  We often face tough choices in life that this novel metaphorically references.  A journey like this cannot go untold and that is why we need you to take this book to the masses.

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get interested in reading “The Unnamed Black Book" the better it will be.  So this campaign will give you the basics on our efforts and progress.  Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved.  I wrote The Unnamed Black Book for your entertainment, so enjoy!  We believe we are on to a brilliant new book and possibly even a film!

 

We all know the feeling, you open the book, read a page, read one more and before you know it you couldn’t put the book down if your life depended on it. Each word rolls off of the page and paints a story that has your mind wondering where it can go next.  We all know the feeling we get when we read THIS kind of book and that is exactly what we have on our hands here… An epic novel that will lend itself to be an incredible film.

In our blink and you miss it society, most of us rely on technology for everything.  But this book teaches us about experiences, imagination and the human race.  While it is fun and twisty plotline, it also has a serious message that everyone can learn from. This book will make you believe in the art of storytelling again.  Hearing this story is a remarkable way to reinforce your belief in the power of words.

With the contribution of $50 or $100 you will receive some really cool perks; cash contributions of all sums are accepted. This is just the beginning of an awesome journey, and you are welcomed to come on board. But wait, why not let your friends in on this, share this with them through word of mouth, emails and social media and have them do the same ...you are going to be a world changer why not start now?

You may be wondering by now… What is the book about?

This book is about a woman who has to find the 7 crowns and rescue the rings of power before she can save the entire world… Or will she??

When she completes this mission she will also have the option to bring back her only son from the dead…

I truly appreciate each and every donation, no matter what it may be. As a thank you I am offering various perks including:

  • Discounted book
  • Auto-graphed books
  • Having your name featured on our website and in the back of our exclusive backers’ copy
  • Getting a personal thank you video from me
  • A signed copy of the original notes for the book
  • Early access to the funder's copy
  • And much more!

For me to bring my vision to life, I need your support!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

Spread the Word & Share Social

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.

Use of Funds

We need about $5-10,000 in order to create the special edition copies as well as the regular book for our funders. That will include marketing, editing, promotion and related expenses for production. The book itself is COMPLETE and will be released as soon as we get the funding. If we are able to reach our stretch goal we would love to take this to filmmakers and have this story unfold on the big screen.

More info about the "The Corlandt Chronicles" (working film title) here on IMDb www.imdb.me/varickaddler with the current development status.

How You Can Help

For us to bring the book life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our self-publishing goals and supporter’s edition of the book.  We want to create copies of our book special just for you! And of course Varick will sign it.  The funding will also assist us with the cost of further editing and production of the first roll out of backer’s books. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first to read: “The Unnamed Black Book”.

The book needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!
 

 


We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our team!
 

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

If you wish to contact us:

Website: www.varickaddler.com

Our Social Media Connections:

✘  Instagram: www.instagram.com/varickaddler

✘  Twitter: www.twitter.com/varickaddler

✘  Facebook: www.facebook.com/varickaddler

Contact Information

Name: Varick Addler

E Mail: varick@varickaddler.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at varick@varickaddler.com
