In only slightly more time than it takes to get a passport, this brave adventuress finds herself thrust into a world of lavish luxury, corporate hijinks, and personal scandal. Jet-setting around the globe with her sociopathic boss, she discovers the line between right and wrong is generally negotiable, and almost always in a language other than English. Forced to her breaking point, Emily has to decide what is more important: her old self-respect or her new career. But first - she’ll have to survive.



Teamwork Makes the Dream Work
This true tale of adventure demands to be shared, so I've teamed up with a talented group of creatives to make it happen.




Our collaboration resulted in some incredible stuff, including high-quality designs, a suite of four American Female short film book trailers with custom music production, a kick-ass launch party featuring craft beer from 4Hands Brewery, gourmet food from Burger 809, live art by Cherokee Street Reach artists, AF trailer screening and pop-up shop, AF art & print gallery, and NYC DJ Nebraska Jones flying in to spin all night.  


American Female Trailer Suite
The American Female Trailer Suite presents a visual and aural experience through the four main themes of the literature: tension, mysticism, adventure, and passion.



#1 TENSION
   

#2 MYSTICISM




#3 ADVENTURE

#4 PASSION





What I Need
I need $10,000. As an independent author, publisher, and marketer, I'm 100% financially responsible for the American Female book launch. I've been making it happen, but now I need your help. Your donation will allow me to actualize my vision in its entirety and bring my story, my passion - my dreams - to life.

Every single dollar will go toward the launch of American Female. This will allow me to 1.) complete the recording of the AF audio book, 2.) finish the creation of an AF art appendix, 3.) print books to ship out for reviews (key for a successful launch), 4.) invest in additional marketing and publicity efforts to spread the word and increase visibility of the book and trailers, 5.) support the 2016 AF book tour, and 6.) begin work on the AF screenplay (scheduled to commence June 2016).
Stretch Goal
Funding raised beyond the initial goal will be applied in the above areas as needed to ensure the success of the American Female book launch, specifically preparing for the creation of the American Female screenplay, and a few other awesome AF-related projects I've had on the back burner just because they didn't fit in the budget. 
What You Get
With your donation, you become an integral part of bringing the next Great American Novel to life. You will also receive perks based on my favorite things: CREATING and EXPERIENCES. Choose from autographed copies of American Female, launch party tickets, custom bookmarks and t-shirts, hand-painted AF art, storytelling sessions, and real life adventures.
I have full confidence that with your support, we can meet the AF financial goal. If for some reason it is not met, 100% of the funds will still be put to use toward the American Female book launch expenses, as described above. This is happening, no matter what.   The Impact Your donation makes a HUGE impact. 
Supporting this project is not only supporting me - it is supporting each and every person who has contributed to the creation of American Female in all its forms. From filmmakers to music producers, designers and animators, to small businesses and more, I've been able to create jobs and provide opportunities for the creative and entrepreneurial community to put their expertise to work. Help me continue to do this, and bring American Female to life.
Your donation also supports fostering more creativity. With every copy of American Female sold, $1 dollar will be donated to the Cherokee Street Reach, an organization focused on empowering Saint Louis City youth through art and experiential learning    



Risks & Challenges Life is risk and of course there are challenges to encounter (I've encountered many along the way thus far), but I don't quit, so I can't fail.

You can help this project be successful by donating now and spreading the word. 
Please tell your friends and family. Share with them the passion I have for this story. Tweet, Facebook & Instagram my campaign. Share the trailers! Word of mouth is the best referral. I appreciate all of the support.

Always in Gratitude,
Emily

story:
The Story

Say hello to Pepe.  He is a penguin with a big heart and a dreamer with great aspirations who must overcome many obstacles in order to accomplish his impossible dream.  What is this dream of his?  It is to perform with the dolphins in the dolphin show.  Obstacle #1: Pepe is just a little penguin.  Penguins don't just perform with dolphins.  Then again, penguins don't talk either.  Yet, Pepe does.  In fact, he is bilingual. 

"Say hello Pepe." "Hola!" ... See I told you.

How will he accomplish his dream?  In order to do this, he must learn many of life's lessons like having the willingness to work hard and watch his weight.  This is not always an easy task because for one thing, Pepe loves to eat!  Can you guess his favorite food?

By following Pepe in his adventures, children will be entertained, encouraged, uplifted, and all the while, they will learn many of life's lessons -- much like the timeless stories of long ago that are still read and quoted to this day.  
- J. D. Lauren

The Adventures of PEPE the Penguin                                                                'PEPE's  DREAM' -  Volume 1                                                                                            'PEPE the Penguin' dreams to be in the Dolphin show at Ocean Castle park.     J. D. Lauren - Author

Why Are We Doing It

As a former educator of young children in public schools, I loved making children laugh by embellishing the stories I read at story time.  I always added my own twists, personalities, and sometimes dialogues to the characters. I loved it when giggling children would say,  "Hee-hee! Teacher, you're so funny!"  

My husband, (designer/illustrator), and I love animals and have always enjoyed watching the silly antics of our own pets.  Animals are truly like cartoons to us.  They make us laugh all the time.  

We want to share this joy with others, as well as, inspire children to aspire to accomplishment, as they learn morals and values through the mistakes and successes of our own little Pepe.

Who We Are                                                                                                            Educator and author, A. Lorraine Pacheco, MA (J.D. Lauren - nom de plume) and     Professional designer/illustrator, R. Phillip Pacheco. 

We are a husband and wife team with a passion for sharing with families the best in reading to their children and have fun along the way. Our mission is serious, and our method is imagination, visual learning, and practical application.
"This is our dream."

Bio: A. Lorraine Pacheco, MA ( J.D. Lauren - nom de plume)                                  https://www.els.edu/en/ELSCenters/Detail?locid=...                                              
click…Meet the Staff...scroll down to 'Lorraine Pacheco.'

Bio: R. Phillip Pacheco, Designer, Illustrator, producer                                            DesignsThatSpeak.net                                                                                                             "Vision, from concept to completion."                                                                  http://facebook.com/designsthatspeak
https://youtu.be/UnGbx8X8btQ - My Jet Bike - Maya
https://youtu.be/jnl2u766vpA - Weekend Box Office - Electirc Image/After Effects.
http://designsthatspeak.net       

Great Reasons To Support Us

Your support will allow us the time to develop, produce, and fully explain 'Pepe's Dream.' You will also allow us to design, illustrate, edit, print, package & deliver every part of 'PEPE's DREAM' volume 1. 

Our goal for 2016 is to produce and introduce a children's picture book series: The Adventures of PEPE the Penguin. 'PEPE's DREAM' is volume 1 from the series.  Development of volumes 2 & 3 will follow. Our ultimate goal is the 3 Volume animated video production of The Adventures of PEPE the Penguin.

With your support, you will enjoy some great perks along the way, including a PDF eBook, a signed hardcover book, bookmarks, more hardcover books to pass around or send to a library of your choice, and a big thank you for your support.  As a sponsor of $25 or more,  Your name will be listed in the book as a sponsor.
In addition, there is an opportunity to have your child's name as one of Pepe's friends throughout the series.

2004:

2016:


Why A Children's Picture Book?

We all treasured picture books when we were children. Many had a positive impact on the way we learned to understand the world today. 

Instead of making yet another penguin book or how to improve a child's learning to read, we want to captivate the visual imagination of young children and adults, so that they can recognize a positive and fun learning experience. 'PEPE the Penguin' will inspire, amaze and fascinate the visual imagination of reading. 

Pepe and Friends
Pepe was sad, when a very wise old penguin said,
"You can do anything you set your mind to do, Pepe."

FOCUS GROUP

As the story of PEPE was developed, early versions were shared with a few members of a creative writing group. Here is an excerpt of their response.

"I sent a copy of 'Pepe's Dream' to my son to read to my granddaughter; she loved it, and wanted the next story."

...another member said.

"Sharks don't circle around prey like that!"… Instructor replied: "But…you don't have any problem with all the animals talking?" …

Why We Need You

Truly, an appealing storybook which children want to read also needs to have excellent illustration and design. The visual look and feel of the book are at least as important as the story. Richly detailed illustration will show, as well as, help tell the story. 

Here are reasons why we need you in our 'PEPE's DREAM' volume 1 funding campaign: time to create, professional art direction, layout, storyboard, design, illustration and production of a finished product with printing, packaging, shipping and distribution.

2016 BUDGET

Volume 1 : 'PEPE's DREAM'  

In order to fully realize 'Pepe's Dream', volume 1, we need to raise $15,000 for expenses below. We have spent many hours of our time and funds developing a business plan to get this far, and we will take this project to the finish line. 

HOW IT WORKS: 2016 - 'PEPE's DREAM' - Volume 1

You can contribute using one of the options above  to the right of your screen.
Thank you for your support. 

Budget Breakdown:
•  Art direction and layout design
•  Cover design
•  32 full-color illustrations
•  Printing (Hard Copy)
•  Shipping 2016
•  Indiegogo and Paypal fees
•  Marketing
•  5% penguin non-profit organization/s
•  Timeline 2016: 3 - 6 month production / delivery projection.

Only You Can Make This Happen

Timeline - Breakdown: 1 - 5 Year Plan 2016 - 2020

•  2016 - 2016: PEPE's DREAM - Volume 1   -   funding in progress
•  2016 - 2017: PEPE the HERO -Volume 2  -  3  -  TBD
•  2017 - 2018: PEPE Goes to HOLLYWOOD  -Volume 2  -  3   -   TBD
•  2018 - 2020: Video Animation Production  & Merchandising  -  TBD

Volumes 2 & 3 funding for the picture books: 'PEPE the HERO' and ' PEPE Goes to HOLLYWOOD' will be posted. Followed by the animated video development. Stay tuned,  this is only the beginning, and only you can make this happen.

You can make the Big Screen Animation happen. The Adventures of 'PEPE the Penguin' featuring the 3 volume children's picture book series can only happen if you make this happen. 

Pepe Helps to Save Real-Life Penguins & Animals.

5% of every dollar raised in this campaign will also be donated to a non-profit organization that helps the plight and preservation of real-life abused and distressed animals and penguins across the real world. 
150,000 penguins perish after giant iceberg traps colony. Read more...  cnn.com/2016/02/13/world/penguins-die-giant-iceberg-irpt/index.html
Share this with your friends and social network.

Thank You For Your Support

R. Phillip & A. Lorraine Pacheco, MA  ( J. D. Lauren) - nom de plume
San Diego, CA

Pepe the Penguin™  ( pending )
© 2000-2016 J.D. Lauren
The Adventures of 'Pepe the Penguin' - Pepe's Dream 
The Adventures of 'Pepe the Penguin' - Pepe the Hero
The Adventures of 'Pepe the Penguin' - Pepe Goes to Hollywood

story:
My name is Lara Fairy Love, I am a Birthing Assistant, I assist people to Birth, Educating, Empowering and Supporting people to make their own choices and create the perfect Birth for them.

 To aid this work I have written a book called ‘The Princess and the Poo’ , it is a simple story in rhyme aimed at children and pregnant people, the story tells of the joys and wisdom to be experienced thru Childbirth “...if you are brave enough to feel...”

In this age of rising caesarian section rates ( 24% at the last count, way over the W.H.O. s safety guidelines of 4% ) and rising maternal mortality rates ( up 3% in the last 3 years ) ; in a country where our government is attempting to outlaw Independent Midwifery, by making it illegal to insure their work at the same time making it illegal to work without insurance , ( totally against the European Court of Human Rights ruling that it is every person’s right to choose , ‘.....where, when and with whom to give birth...’ ); where our children are fed T.V. dramas where Birth is always an ‘emergency’ and education focuses on pain relief rather than the on the biological facts about the wonders of our bodies, I decided that the way to inspire the masses to Birth the next generation better, would be to 1* inspire our Princess to have a home birth and 2* to get my book read in every junior school library in the British Isles!So I sent Princess Katharine and Prince William a copy of my book and an inspirational letter outlining the facts of where our country stands and how they could inspire a nation to reclaim their Births and create, a truly loving and empowered next generation.

 I received a letter back, thanking me very much and saying that they were very touched!

 The first mission was to travel to every school in the British isles and to read the story to them, create a play , and generate discussions with the children that will lead on to more education and empowerment about childbirth. We didn't go to every single one but we did go to ALOT!

The next mission is to go to the places that the book has been translated in , Spain, France , Holland and Germany , and to do more workshops there!

The way that we give birth and the way that we are born are defining factors in how we evolve as humane human beings! To educate our next generation so that they give birth to our grandchildren in love and peace is the pathway to really creating peace on earth! Peace on earth begins with peaceful birth.

What We Need & What You Get

To create this book tour we need travel costs! Each country has a host where we can stay and our food will be sorted . our work will be voluntary and all funds will go towards getting to each place and making sure as many books as possible get read and seen by as many people as possible!

The Impact

To give birth on peace, joyfully and lovingly is every human womans birthright! To be born in peace , held lovingly in your mothers arms , free from abuse and harm is every humans birthright!

 In this modern age we are fourtunate in this country to have so much  and to have progressed so far, however the ceaserian secton rate is going up and the homebirth rate is going down.

 Homebirth is safe and cost effective and could be utilized by up to 70% of the population saving our ailing NHS a lot of money! it costs £800 for a homebirth and £2000 for a c section!, at the moment our homebirth rate is 3% and could change drastically if we only educated ourselves and our children about birth properly!

 In an age of tv drama birth is always depicted as an emergency and our children and ourselves have grown to see birth as something abnormal and terrifying, instead of an amazing life changing extreme physical process, filled with love!

 Oxytocin ( fast labor in greek), the hormone responsible for  the birth process, and the opening of the birth canal, is only secreted when the body is relaxed and calm, as soon as there is fear the body switchs to creating adrenaline, the closing fight or flight hormone. Just this simple knowledge is changing hospital birth protocols all over the world  but if the women giving birth are still terrified because of the tv and lack of education then she will still need a lot of medical intervention to birth her baby.

Educated empowered birth is only going to happen if we educate and empower our selves and our children. Please help me start this process ! Peace on earth begins with peacfull birth! We will change this world one birth at a time!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute there are still many ways you can help!

* Bookmark my website fairydoula.co.uk and send it onto a pregnant friend!

* Buy my book 'The Princess and The Poo' on lulu marketplace and read it to your children or grandchildren and yourself

* Follow me on Twitter @FairyDoula

* Find Fairy Doula on Facebook

* Check my blog Saarrukaa Goddess of Birth and Fire and give the info to everyone who you think needs to know

* Join Midwifery Today and send their e-magazine to anyone who needs it!

* Live Love

story:
In Short

When I shot this group breastfeeding portrait in June of this year, I had no idea of the great response I would get, and I loved working with all the beautiful families involved. I also love this city, so much! I've brought together my passions to help normalize breastfeeding.

Here's some things you may like to know. 

  • I've been a paid photographer for 14 years, I've been a Buffalonian for 7 years, I've been a mother for 5. 
  • Over 100 women have participated in these shoots so far, whether in group shoots or solo sessions. The number of months these children have been nursing total almost 100 years.
  • Normalizing breastfeeding is incredibly important. It's about educating people to understand that the nursing mother isn't trying to "whip it out" and show off, she's providing the most natural of nutrition to her babies.

 Your contribution will help me create a book that not only shows both recognizable and not-so-recognizable Buffalo landmarks, the beauty, grace and self-sacrifice in these moms and their mother-child relationships, educates people on the importance of supporting mothers. 

What I Need & What You Get

 I need a remaining 9k to pay for 50 20x30 canvases and the marketing for the show, paying the book designer and editor, and 300 copies of the book!

Some of the perks for donating are my undying gratitude!, boob beanies, posters, prints, signed copies of the book, even your own session to be used as for a nursing portrait, family session, head shot, and more!

The Impact

All the time, I'm hearing moms share their painful experience of being shamed for doing what comes natural to us. The relationship between mother and child shouldn't be cause for stigma, especially when the mother is providing the most basic needof nutrition for her child. I hope this series helps normalize breastfeeding because the more we share our journeys as breastfeeding moms and the more normal breastfeeding becomes in society and the less women will be shamed for it. Not having shame attached to something so natural contributes to a healthy emotional balance for mom, which will helps contribute to the bond between mother and child.

Risks & Challenges

 Well, I've already had a camera loss and software meltdown since the beginning of this project- the camera suffered too extensive damage from a fall during one of my beach group nursing shoots and the software just got old and weary- so both have already been replaced. Unless my computer up and kicks it, I don't foresee any more issues on my end! 

 Other, less obvious challenges, has been some backlash from non-participants. Criticisms have been far and few between, only once have we encountered an on-location incident, and it was unsettling, but my warrior moms persevered on in their shoot. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

And if you are unable to make a monetary donation at this time, please share our campaign with your social media circle so that we can spread the word to others who may be interested.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Das 40inch Longboardmagazin gibt es seit 2012. Seitenzahl 100 - 124 Seiten. Die Auflage beträgt 2000 Exemplare bei einem bisherigen Verkaufspreis von 5 Euro.

Im Gegensatz zu "normalen" Skateboardmagazinen, beschäftigen wir uns mit den Gesichtern hinter der Kulisse, mit besonderen Projekten und gerne engagieren wir uns auch für Firmen oder Personen, die anderen helfen. News aus der Szene, Industrie und Stories aus der bunten Vergangenheit des Longboardens runden die dreimonatliche Publikation ab.

Mit dem beginnenden Longboard-Trend ist auch das 40inch Longboardmagazin immer beliebter geworden. Um flächendeckend arbeiten zu können, benötigen wir Euren Support. Bis dato ist das Magazin nur in Fachgeschäften oder online erhältlich. Zumeist waren die Auflagen in den Shops schnell vergriffen. Ein Nachdruck war aus finanziellen Gründen nicht möglich.

Mit einem Invest von 19.500 Euro können wir unsere Auflage erhöhen und den Bahnhofsbuchhandel deutschlandweit bestücken und den Fachhandel besser bedienen. Da dies zunächst kostenintensiv ist, benötigen wir Eure Unterstützung. Warum wir flächendeckend arbeiten wollen?

Longboardfahren ist der am schnellesten wachsende Sport der letzten zwei Jahre. Es gibt keine bestätigten Zahlen, jedoch dürfte die Anzahl der verkauften Longboards in den letzten Jahren in Deutschland um die 400.000 Stück betragen. Genaue Zahlen hierzu gibt es nicht. Aber in die Richtung wird es wohl gehen Wir erhalten sehr oft Mails von Fans, die sich wünschen, das Magazin direkt bei sich im Ort kaufen zu können.

Ein Magazin ist für eine Extremsportszene ein sehr wichtiges Medium. Ohne dieses verliert eine Szene seine Chronisten und damit den Status den sie verdient.

Das 40inch Magazin wird auch weiter erscheinen, wenn die Kampagne nicht zündet. Wenn auch wie bisher, nur in ausgewählten Shops oder eben online. Und weiterhin in sehr kleiner Auflage mit eben auch sehr beschränkten Möglichkeiten.


Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

  • Es werden in etwa 15.000 Euro für den Druck benötigt und ca. 4000 Euro für die Distribution. über die Pressedistribution + Versand.
  • Wenn das Founding Ziel nicht erreicht wird, werden wir die Ausgabe natürlich trotzdem herstellen, wie auch alle anderen Produkte. Jedoch in kleinerer Auflage. Dein Invest wird trotzdem mit den Pearks belohnt werden.


Die Folgen

Was machen wir mit all dem Geld - und was wenn wir das Ziel nicht erreichen?

  • Hilfe! Wir wurden überfallen... So oder ähnlich muß es vielen Longboardshops in den letzten zwei Jahren ergangen sein. Damit auch weiterhin die Szene erfolgreich vergrößert wird, braucht es ein geeignetes Medium. Selbstredend ist das Internet mit Facebook und vielen anderen sozialen Medien schon reichlich vertreten. Aber ein deutsches Longboardmagazin (print) gibt es nicht. Bis auf das 40inch Magazin. Wir sind uns sicher - wenn wir die breite Masse über die Pressedistribution erreichen, dann kann auch eine große Auflage erfolgreich verkauft werden. Die ist für den Longboardsport, speziell im Hinblick auf die nächsten Jahre sehr wichtig.
  • Und für uns? Wir als Printmagazin haben uns dem alten, bewährten aber vielleicht dogmatischen "auf´s Papier bringen" verschrieben. Obwohl der Aufwand vielfach höher ist, als eine Onlineausgabe und das finanzielle Risiko immens, bleiben wir am Ball. Mit den bisherigen Ausgaben, hatten wir nur sehr geringe Erträge oder die Kostendeckung erreicht. Es wäre für uns sehr hilfreich einen finanziellen Anschub zu erhalten, der uns dabei unterstützt die guten Grafiker und Texter zu behalten und sogar in neue Technik zu investieren. Wir haben noch einiges vor.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Für Euch als Unterstützer besteht kaum Risiko. Eure Ausgaben werdet ihr erhalten, und auch zukünftig wird es das Magazin geben. Ob wir allerdings in Zukunft auf dem hohen Level der Produktion mit 250gr. Bilderdruckkarton-Einband und 115g. Bilderdruckpapier auf 100 oder mehr Seiten publizieren können, das können wir nicht versprechen.

Aber wenn die Kampagne klappt...

  • Es gibt noch soviele Geschichten zu erzählen, von den Leuten hinter dem Sport Longboard (skate) - Wir reden von über 50 Jahren Begeisterung...
  • Mit einer höheren Auflage können höhere Anzeigenpreise realisiert werden, eventuell auch außerhalb des Longboardsports, die Verkaufserlöse steigen. 20000x4 Euro ist ein anderer Erlös wie bisher mit im Schnitt 2000x3 Euro.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Ihr habt grade kein Geld um uns zu supporten. Kein Problem. Vielleicht könnt ihr uns anders helfen.

  • Wir suchen Geschichten rund um das Longboarden. Aussergewöhnliches über aussergewöhnliche Projekte und Persönlichkeiten.
  • Ihr habt Fotos die es wert sind veröffentlicht zu werden?

story:
Proyecto Kata es una iniciativa que buscar dar a conocer parte de la historia del Karate en Costa Rica, desde sus inicios hasta el presente. Su influencia será presentada desde la perspectiva de 3 diferentes maestros de 3 diferentes generaciones que han compartido el mismo lugar de entrenamiento en diferentes etapas de sus vidas: El Dojo Budokan en San Pedro, Costa Rica.  

El segundo objetivo del proyecto es documentar las Katas que forman parte del estilo Tode Kai, su filosofía e historia. Estas serán presentadas en diferentes ubicaciones del paisaje costarricense.  

Esta producción es una idea de Miguel Solano-Romagosa y Juriel Navarro Salas con la colaboración de Xabier Irigibel y Francisco Ramírez.

---

Proyecto Kata is an initiative which aims to tell part of the history of Karate in Costa Rica from its first days until present time. Its influence will be presented from the perspective of 3 different masters of 3 different generations whom have shared the same training ground in different moments of their lives: The Budokan Dojo in San Pedro, Costa Rica.

The second objective is to document the Kata which are part of the Tode Kai style, their history and philosophy. Each Kata will be presented from different locations of the Costa Rican landscape.

This production is an idea developed by Miguel Solano-Romagosa and Juriel Navarro Salas with the collaboration of Xabier Irigibel and Francisco Ramírez.

story:
Short Summary

I am a widely-published writer, poet (author of SPORES FROM SHARNOTH AND OTHER MADNESSES, P'rea Press, now in its 4th printing) and occultist. This chapbook combines all my interests - three stories of Sherlock Holmes set against backgrounds of occult and horrific menace.

My campaign is important to me because I am passionate about Sherlock Holmes, the greatest detective of all time. I loved writing these stories set in the Victorian area, and they have already garnered acclaim from their first in-print appearances.

If you fund my campaign you will be helping produce an entertaining chapbook that will delight all Holmes fans, with some dark overtones sure to delight horror readers too!

The project is FULLY AUTHORISED BY THE ESTATE OF SIR ARTHUR CONAN DOYLE  

What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $800 to fund the costs of printing a limited edition quantity of the chapbook. $200 and any excess above the funding campaign target will be reserved for sending out review and complimentary copies to some of the most influential people in the Holmes and horror worlds.

Unique perks of this campaign are as follows:

Contribute $25 and get a copy of the chapbook personally signed by author Leigh Blackmore.

Contribute $40 and get a copy personally signed by both Leigh Blackmore and the interior artist. 

Contribute $50 and get a copy personally signed by both Leigh Blackmore and the interior artist, together with a paperback novel based on Holmes as a character (limit of 6 on this perk) of Leigh's choosing. 

Contribute $75 and get a copy personally signed by both Leigh Blackmore and the interior artist, together with a rare out-of-print copy of Leigh Blackmore's horror magazine Terror Australis: The Australian Horror and Fantasy Magazine (limit of 2 on this perk)

If the campaign does not reach its goal, the funds realised will be held until the project can be realised next year (2017). All donors of 'perks' amounts will still receive their perk, during 2017 when the chapbook appears.

The Impact

The stories included are:

“The Adventure of the Metaphysics of Mania” © April 2015 Leigh Blackmore. First published in Mantichore 10, No 1.

“The Arcana of Death” © 2014 Steve Lines. First Published in Strange Detective Stories 4.

“Exalted Are the Forces of Darkness” (slightly abridged) © 2009 J. R. Campbell and Charles Prepolec (eds.) First published in Gaslight Grotesque: Nightmare Tales of Sherlock Holmes. Calgary, Alberta: Edge Publishing.

Dubbed ‘Mr Horror’ by the Australian press, Leigh Blackmore is a past President of the Australian Horror Writers Association, and edited for them Midnight Echo Issue 5 (2011).He formerly edited Terror Australis magazine (1987-92) and its subsequent book anthology (1993) and is a four-time Ditmar Award nominee (once for fiction and thrice for criticism).

Here's what critics said about JUST ONE of the three stories to be collected in this chapbook:

“Exalted Are the Forces of Darkness”

“Mighty entertaining…a feuilleton blending a story of greed about a substantial inheritance with the magic activities of Aleister Crowley and the Golden Dawn.”

— Mario Guslandi, www.sfsite.com

“The story holds the interest all the way, with some fascinating details about Crowley, an amoral albeit engaging personality, and other occultists of the period…”

-- Peter Tennant (UK),  Black Static No. 16.

“Brilliant…succeeded admirably in every way. You have my utmost respect for your authentic portrayal of the occult as a true believer. Your story rang with a note of truth that is rare to find in fiction. I shall always admire you for that accomplishment.”

--William Patrick Maynard, (US), author of The Terror of Fu Manchu et al.

 

Risks & Challenges

I have edited various publications for over 30 years, and work fulltime as a manuscript assessor and proofreader. I am confident in being able to bring print projects to fruition. 

I already have two pieces of colour art from the fantastic Steve Lines of UK's Rainfall Books, which will serve as back and front cover images for the chapbook.

Additionally, the interior illustrator, Phillip Cornell, is currently at work on the illustrations for each story.

New York writer Peter H. Cannon, the author of the Introduction is also in the process of writing his Introduction.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially, I would greatly appreciate your sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media, and telling your friends about it. Give it some buzz!

  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools to draw attention to the campaign!

story:
Hola, soy Valeria Peconi, una chica de 16 años, campeona nacional juvenil de surf 2016, estoy convocada para participar en el mundial juvenil organizado por la ISA ( international surfing association ) qué tendrá lugar en Las Islas Azores, Portugal en septiembre. 

He tenido que superar varios retos a nivel personal ,en los últimos meses para poder tener un espacio en dónde pueda seguir mi pasión en la vida, desde los 9 años me he dedicado a este fascinante deporte en el cual he podido lograr 1eros lugares a nivel nacional, ser parte de esta nueva aventura es otro paso, pero sin su apoyo no me sería posible poder llevarlo a cabo, la inversión es bastante en cuanto se trata de ir al continente europeo,hasta ahora los únicos patrocinadores económicos han sido mis padres,con nuestro negocio familiar, ( helado artesanal/gelato). El interés principal de pedir su apoyo es el de involucrar a más personas que sientan pasión por el deporte y vean las necesidades reales que se necesitan como joven atleta . El surf, es un deporte extremo,que además de estar en contacto con la fuerza del océano, nos ayuda a tratar de difundir el mantener la limpieza y conservar los ecosistemas y sus seres vivos, en mi corta vida he aprendido a disfrutar de cada parte de este escenario, y como joven me gustaría ser parte de promover el deporte y el medio ambiente, así como ayudar a las nuevas generaciones a tener más oportunidades para poder salir adelante a pesar de los inconvenientes que la vida nos proporcione. Espero poder contar con su apoyo , de no ser posible económicamente, el de difundir mi mensaje. Gracias y espero poder anunciarles próximamente mi participación en el mundial juvenil.
story_txt: Hola, soy Valeria Peconi, una chica de 16 años, campeona nacional juvenil de surf 2016, estoy convocada para participar en el mundial juvenil organizado por la ISA ( international surfing association ) qué tendrá lugar en Las Islas Azores, Portugal en septiembre. He tenido que superar varios retos a nivel personal ,en los últimos meses para poder tener un espacio en dónde pueda seguir mi pasión en la vida, desde los 9 años me he dedicado a este fascinante deporte en el cual he podido lograr 1eros lugares a nivel nacional, ser parte de esta nueva aventura es otro paso, pero sin su apoyo no me sería posible poder llevarlo a cabo, la inversión es bastante en cuanto se trata de ir al continente europeo,hasta ahora los únicos patrocinadores económicos han sido mis padres,con nuestro negocio familiar, ( helado artesanal/gelato). El interés principal de pedir su apoyo es el de involucrar a más personas que sientan pasión por el deporte y vean las necesidades reales que se necesitan como joven atleta . El surf, es un deporte extremo,que además de estar en contacto con la fuerza del océano, nos ayuda a tratar de difundir el mantener la limpieza y conservar los ecosistemas y sus seres vivos, en mi corta vida he aprendido a disfrutar de cada parte de este escenario, y como joven me gustaría ser parte de promover el deporte y el medio ambiente, así como ayudar a las nuevas generaciones a tener más oportunidades para poder salir adelante a pesar de los inconvenientes que la vida nos proporcione. Espero poder contar con su apoyo , de no ser posible económicamente, el de difundir mi mensaje. Gracias y espero poder anunciarles próximamente mi participación en el mundial juvenil.

story:
Starting the Journey

Hi we are Mary and Ronald Crampton, authors of the forthcoming book, An Engraved Mark: A Journey to Find Character.

(Feel free to read book excerpt: http://www.anoddbox.com/an%20engraved%20mark.htm)

Ronald is a Licensed Professional Counselor. Mary is a Business Systems Analyst. But these are just labels they have achieved throughout their lives. Ronald is a Marine--A war veteran who has seen the ugliest of what humans can do. Mary is a woman who was told, "Women cannot do that." Mary is a leader who achieves amazing loyalty through the genuineness of her unique way. However, she has often struggled with those who want her to command loyalty rather than reciprocate loyalty. Ronald is really good at the actual meaning of respect. He has an impressive talent in revealing the value within others. However, he struggles with the observation and realization that others do not actually value themselves. We decided to take a leap of faith and take a break from our careers to focus on writing about a topic we are both passionate about--Character.

This book starts with Ronald's personal journey through his lifetime in which he would find the values of character. It then moves into a journey section where in collaboration with Mary, we explain the characters and virtues and offer guidance to help you with your own personal journey.

For us, this is our work of a lifetime, something we believe we are meant to do. This is really more than a book for us, it is a launching point for a movement. We believe that building a world of great character, is done one unique person at a time.

Admittedly taking the break from our jobs is rather frightening. Life does not stop, regardless of our passion. From the cost of designing the cover to editing to printing, we take the hit. We decided to take on self-publishing because it was appearing that the industry wanted to take away our voice from the book. How could we ask you to be unique, if we abandon from the very start, what the book--the movement--is all about.

By helping us with the publishing of this book you are inspiring the message of being unique--Of being the engraved marks of who you are.

What We Need & What You Get

It is shocking just how much it costs to publish a book. Approximately:

  • $5000 goes toward editing.
  • $3000 for the design of cover and interior.
  • $5000 for printing of 1000 copies of softcover.
  • $7000 for printing of 500 copies of hardcover
  • $1250 (5%) to Indiegogo fee
  • $1250 (5%) to credit card fees
  • $2500 for materials, development, and fulfillment of perks.
Perks include:
  • $10 - Heartfelt recognition on our AnOddBox website.
  • $50 - You will receive one (1) signed softcover book.
  • $75 - You will receive one (1) signed hardcover book.
  • $100 - Perception Profile to personally engage in the book of An Engraved Mark plus you will receive one (1) signed softcover book.
  • $150 - Perception Profile to personally engage in the book of An Engraved Mark plus you will receive one (1) signed hardcover book.
  • $300 - Perception Profile plus one (1) individual session conducted via email or one (1) 55-minute office visit if within Denver metro area.

We believe this book has great purpose. If the amount of funds requested is not achieved all accumulated funds will still go toward publishing the book and all additional costs will be covered by us regardless.

The Impact

I have spent most of my life living the scripts others had written for me and feeling the scars of the labels branded on my own definition. It took nearly forty years for me to finally step one foot into my own life. It took an additional ten years to discover and define who I truly am--To define my engraved marks.

In my own journey, I observed that I was not unique in being bastardized into a life and a definition that was not my own. Nearly every person I have met thus far has not been able to accurately define who they are. For some, it is of no concern and they are content with the complacency of their lives. For others, the burden of feeling lost and without a place to belong was too great and they succumbed to the depression of conforming. A few, however, feel the same calling as I do. It is a calling to be something more. But to become something more, one must first become what the one actually is.

A few years ago, I created what I call Character Profiling. It is an assessment and workshop program to help individuals define their actual character and start controlling the direction of their own lives. The individuals who have engaged in Character Profiling stand more solid with pride. They have achieved more meaningful relationships, even if it meant first ending an incompatible relationship. They have strengthened family relationships, relationships with friends, and significantly improved working relationships. And most important, they have been able to define their own engraved marks.

Our hope with this book An Engraved Mark: A Journey to Find Character, is that for those of you who are like me--like us--and feel you are standing in the middle of a desert with three-hundred and sixty degrees of horizons that all look the same, this book will help you take your first step in the direction of who you are.

With your help, as Mary has said, “We can build a world of great character one person at a time.”

Risks & Challenges

We have already faced obstacles in the writing of this book, as it is not common--We are not common. We have been lambasted quite a bit because we do not follow the standard rules. The book is about embracing being an outlier and being proud of standing outside the norm. We have been adamantly instructed to follow the standard rules, but this would go against the core of the movement. We have to do this honorably. AND we refuse to give up our voice.

We quit our jobs because we believe in this cause. However, this means that we have been paying for everything out of our savings. If we cannot reach the goal to help us publish this book, we will still do it even if it means we have to start all over to rebuild ourselves. Like we stated, we are in this 100%.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help us monetarily right now, there are other ways you can help. Please forward this campaign to others you know to help get the word out and spark interest. Apparently, Indiegogo has some good share tools and with other social medias, you might even start a global crusade.

By all means, let us know what you can do. AND thank you for doing so.

story:
My Story

My involvement in the AIDS community began in the late '80s as a fundraiser in Chicago. I worked with several AIDS service organizations planning events and writing grant proposals, on staff and as a consultant. The picture you see here is of me with my assistant, Steve Showalter, at one of our events in 1990. He died a couple years later. By 1994, now married with a new baby, I burned out. I kept up on new treatment developments and marked World AIDS Day, but that was it. 

In 2011, publisher Tracy Baim asked me contribute to Windy City Times'  "AIDS@30" series. I wasn't sure I would remember anything, but I was wrong. I sat down at the computer and the keyboard fairly smoked. It wasn't just that I was typing fast: it was a long-repressed anger at what I'd seen and experienced. Memories rushed back and overwhelmed me at times, even as I wrote a book, Friend Grief and AIDS: Thirty Years of Burying Our Friends. I was back in the community, joining ACT UP/NY, now as a writer and activist. 

But it was a panel discussion - "The Women of ACT UP/NY: Fight Back! Fight AIDS!" - held at the New York Public Library in April, 2014 that gave me the idea for this book. The auditorium was full, and though I was familiar with a lot of what they discussed, my college-student daughter and many in the audience were not. The thought that popped into my head that night, the thought that I couldn't dismiss, was "These stories need to be told."

Let's Be Honest: Does the World Really Need Another Book about AIDS?

I asked myself the same question. I checked the literature of the epidemic, sure that straight women had been included. But as important as many of those books are, they tend to be written by and reflect the experiences of gay men. Even books about women's history give little or no notice to an epidemic that has raged for thirty-five years: an epidemic that has affected straight women from the beginning and disproportionately affects women of color.

This book, then, is different. It fills a gap not only in the history of the AIDS epidemic, but in women's history as well. It honors the contributions of straight women around the world who often rushed in when others ran away.

Which brings us to the next question: Why me?

Between 2013 and 2016, I published a series of six small books about people grieving their friends. That series prepared me to write a much larger, more challenging book. My involvement in the AIDS community has earned me the respect of my peers, many of whom have already assisted in the research. And the book itself - the focus on the contributions of women who have largely gone unrecognized - has generated great interest from men and women alike.

By supporting this campaign, you'll be part of something that is new, different, important and eagerly anticipated. How do I know that? A leading AIDS publication asked a few months ago when they can print an excerpt. Two bookstores have committed to book launch parties. Reviewers and magazine publishers have asked for the opportunity to help promote it. Organizations from San Francisco to New York, as well as London, are helping with the research.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The campaign goal is $1,500. That will pay a large chunk of travel expenses for my January trip to the East Coast. I'll be interviewing women in Philadelphia, Baltimore, Washington, DC and Atlanta. Meeting my goal will cover travel to and from Chicago and between cities, local travel and most of my housing costs, including meals. I'm a pretty efficient traveler. If I don't meet the goal, the money still goes towards that trip.

But you really want to know what you get for your donation, don't you?

One of my favorite organizations is Broadway Cares/Equity FIghts AIDS. As a former fundraiser I'm in awe of their success (and yes, you'll meet women from there in the book, including one of the founders, Colleen Dewhurst). In fact, sales of my earlier book about losing friends to AIDS benefit BC/EFA.

Many of your perks come from their store. The ones listed here are the start: more will be added later in the campaign, so you'll want to check back every Monday to find out what's new. The first group of perks, depending on the level of support include:

  • Shout-out on social media and in my weekly newsletter to thank you for your support.
  • Recognition in the book itself.
  • Email newsletter with updates and news for supporters (twice a month)
  • The e-book of Fag Hags, Divas and Moms.
  • A signed print copy of Fag Hags, Divas and Moms.
  • A special invitation to the book's launch party in New York or Chicago.

And from Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS:

  • A hard-cover journal and pen
  • 2017 Broadway Bares calendar
  • Carols for a Cure, Volume 18,  2-cd set
  • And more, coming weekly during the campaign

 

The Impact

When I started work on this book last fall, I was wasn't sure if anyone else thought it was interesting, much less important.

Within minutes of posting a request for leads on Facebook, I began receiving messages from people in the US and UK with names and contact information for women to interview. And they all said, "Thank you for doing this." When most people think of the AIDS epidemic and who it impacted, they think of white, gay men. Women - whether HIV-positive or negative, volunteer or staff, family member or friend - are rarely considered. 

There will certainly be recognizable names in the book: Elizabeth Taylor and Princess Diana, for example. But most of the women in it are the ones who gave of themselves without public recognition. They deserve to have their contributions honored. It's time.

Last year, I won the Christopher Hewitt Award for Creative Nonfiction from A&U Magazine for an AIDS-related essay, "Long-Term Survivor". Until I wrote that, I did not consider myself a member of that club. I'm HIV-negative, so I assumed I was excluded. But I was wrong, because as Jeff Berry from TPAN (Test Positive Aware Network) insisted: "You were there." Yes, I was, in those dark, frightening, angry early days of the epidemic. And so were a lot of other straight women who you will meet in the pages of this book.

 

Risks & Challenges

At this point the biggest challenge is the timeline. I've set World AIDS Day 2017 as my publication date. And yes, that's pretty aggressive. I wouldn't feel comfortable with it if I hadn't already done quite a bit of research. 

Although there are several agents interested in the book, I am proceeding on the assumption that I'm self-publishing, as I've successfully done with my other books. 

However, no plan is perfect. If there is any delay, that would make publication March 1, 2018, the beginning of Women's History Month. It seems like a long way's off, but it's really not (that's why there are perks for now and perks for later). 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Money's not everything, nor is it the only thing. And this book is simply not possible without the contributions of men and women around the world who are just as passionate about bringing these stories to life as I am.

Here are some important ways you can help whether you donate to the campaign or not:

  • If you're a straight woman who has been involved in the AIDS community at any time in the epidemic, share your story with me.
  • You can 'like' the Facebook page dedicated to the book. 
  • Follow me on Twitter or Pinterest, for updates and links to articles related to the book.
  • Let your friends and family know about this project by using the Indiegogo share tools.

And know, too, that however you choose to support this campaign, your efforts are deeply appreciated. You'll be helping create a book that  will finally recognize the achievements of straight women around the world who have made a huge difference for thirty-five years.

story:
Who We Are

AlManarah is a grassroots organization based in Nazareth, Israel that seeks to work with, empower, and advocate on behalf of disabled Arabs. 

AlManarah's International Library for the Print-Disabled produces audio recordings of books and other texts to make them accessible for both disabled and non-disabled individuals in the Arabic-speaking world. In 2014, AlManarah's International Library greatly expanded by 333%, receiving on average 21,646 hits on its website each month! 

The aim of the library is to provide information and literature that would not normally be available to the disabled in Israel’s Arab communities so they can participate and contribute to society as equal citizens.

To increase access for a greater number of individuals in Israel and beyond, AlManarah is launching its 2014 Indiegogo campaign to raise money for the recording of children's books in Arabic, to be added to the online library.

The Goal

  • $30,000 USD to cover the costs associated with recording 100 children's books for AlManarah's library ($300 per book)
  • Money used to purchase books, commission voice overs, use recording studio, and edit materials
  • Even if we don't reach our goal, we'll put the money we do raise toward recording as many children's books as possible for addition to our library

The Impact

 Arabic materials for print-disabled children are severely lacking; your contribution to the AlManarah Children's Library Initiative would help close this gap and provide badly-needed resources for underserved communities.

Other Ways You Can Help

Connect with us on Facebook, on Twitter, or on our website to learn more, and to spread the word!

If you're not able to financially contribute, consider donating books or your time, instead!

Please feel free to contact us at any time, we are always happy to meet new friends and hear their suggestions.

AlManarah Association

P.O. Box 11053

Nazareth, Israel 16211

The aim of the library is to provide information and literature that would not normally be available to the disabled in Israel’s Arab communities so they can participate and contribute to society as equal citizens.
To increase access for a greater number of individuals in Israel and beyond, AlManarah is launching its 2014 Indiegogo campaign to raise money for the recording of children's books in Arabic, to be added to the online library.   The Goal  $30,000 USD to cover the costs associated with recording 100 children's books for AlManarah's library ($300 per book)
Money used to purchase books, commission voice overs, use recording studio, and edit materials
Even if we don't reach our goal, we'll put the money we do raise toward recording as many children's books as possible for addition to our library    The Impact
 Arabic materials for print-disabled children are severely lacking; your contribution to the AlManarah Children's Library Initiative would help close this gap and provide badly-needed resources for underserved communities.

    Other Ways You Can Help 
Connect with us on Facebook, on Twitter, or on our website to learn more, and to spread the word!If you're not able to financially contribute, consider donating books or your time, instead!Please feel free to contact us at any time, we are always happy to meet new friends and hear their suggestions.AlManarah AssociationP.O. Box 11053Nazareth, Israel 16211

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Wir helfen Geflüchteten - direkt und unbürokratisch. Dort, wo unsere Hilfe am dringendsten benötigt wird!

Nach unserer ersten erfolgreichen Fahrt an die Slowenisch-Kroatische Grenze (Brežice und Dobova) vom 27. - 29.10.2015 waren wir überwältigt. Von den kriegsähnlichen Zuständen vor Ort, aber auch davon, was wir mit unserer Hilfe bewirken konnten.

Wir haben nicht nur Nahrungsmittel an Menschen verteilt, die teilweise seit Tagen nichts mehr gegessen haben, sondern auch einen ganzen Transporter voll Kleidung, Schuhen, Decken und vielen anderen Dingen, die dringend benötigt wurden.

Deshalb planen wir bereits die nächste Fahrt für den 12.11.2015, wieder mit einem randvollen Transporter (oder zwei, wenn es die Mittel zulassen) und mindestens drei Freiwilligen Helfern.

Sachspenden wie Kleidung, Schuhe und einigen Hygieneartikeln erhalten wir von mehreren Freiwilligen-Lagern in München (u. A. von Andreas Einbeck und dem Lager in der Schwere-Reiter-Str.).

Folgende Dinge müssen aber leider zugekauft werden/kosten Geld und dafür brauchen wir EURE UNTERSTÜTZUNG:

  • Decken und Regencapes
  • Hygiene-Artikel
  • Nahrungsmittel und Wasser
  • Miete für Transporter, Treibstoff und Mauten

Bitte helft uns, die Situation vor Ort an den ständig wechselnden Brennpunkten maßgeblich zu verbessern!


Camp Dobova 1 (Slowenien), 28.10.2015


Camp Brežice (Slowenien), 28.10.2015

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Durch Deine Spende sind wir in der Lage den nächsten Transport zu realisieren.

Sobald wir genug Spenden erhalten haben, geht es für uns sofort wieder auf Achse!

  • Du hilfst uns, Geflüchteten in den Lagern entlang der Grenzen zu helfen
  • Deine Spende wird 1:1 in die oben genannten Dinge investiert - Ehrenwort!
  • Wir versorgen die Flüchtlinge in den Camps mit Kleidung, Nahrungsmitteln, Wasser, Hygieneartikeln und medizinischen Produkten, sowie einem Lächeln!
  • Übrige Spenden werden entweder für den nächsten Transport verwendet oder an andere Hilfstransporte weitergegeben

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Für uns ist die Hilfe selbstverständlich, weshalb wir dafür einige Risiken gerne in Kauf nehmen. Risiken für Euch als Spender gibt es keine - wir fahren und helfen auf jeden Fall.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Organisiert selbst humanitäre Hilfstransporte zu den Camps in den Grenzregionen. In Österreich, Slowenien, Kroatien und Serbien.
Oder spendet Kleidung, Schuhe, Decken, Kuscheltiere, stilles Wasser in Flaschen, Abgepackte und haltbare Nahrungsmittel (z. B. Dosenfisch, Müsliriegel) an Eure lokalen Sammelstellen, damit andere Hilfstransporte davon profitieren können.
Aktuelle Informationen über Sammelstellen und Spendenbedarf erhaltet Ihr meist am aktuellsten über die vielen Facebook-Gruppen, wie z. B. "Hilfe für Flüchtlinge in München"
Informationen über Hilfstransporte und aktuelle Brennpunkte erhaltet Ihr bei der IHA (iha.help) oder bei der "German Alliance for Civilian Assistance".
Bitte lest vor Eurer ersten Hilfsfahrt auf jeden Fall die Hinweise für freiwillige Helfer im Ausland!

VIELEN DANK FÜR EUER VERTRAUEN UND EURE UNTERSTÜTZUNG!!!
Euer Team von Welcome Help

story:
It's time for JAMM... issue #3 !!!

Just A Minor Malfunction... is an independent science-fiction e-zine, dedicated to publishing quality, thought-provoking, professionally-edited sci-fi.  We take submissions, and no story will receive a form letter rejection.

After the launch of JAMM... issue #1 ( https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01G223BWS ) and issue #2 ( https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01NA9QRAY ) with stories from 12 independent authors, it's time for issue #3!

 

About the Editor

My name is Michael S. Alter, and I am a life-long sci-fi fan.  I grew up reading Asimov's and Analog, Heinlein and Clarke.  I love the stories, although editing errors would always throw me.

A few years back I started writing my own stories, and earlier this year I decided to try my hand at publishing.  I launched issue #1 with several key ideas in mind:

No form letters to authors submitting a story.  I'll always give you at least some personalized feedback.

Sharing the profits with the authors.  All authors receive a share of the proceeds according to a formula.

Authors retain the rights to their work, even after my edits.  I only keep the right to continue publishing the story as part of the issue of the magazine.

Low-priced, high-quality stories, about a dozen or so per issue.  I'm a strong editor, I'll work with my authors to put out only the best stories.  I have additional reviewers/editors keeping me honest, too.  (Thanks again to Louise Sorensen and Mel McElveen!)

I'm not trying to make big money out of this, only enough to take my wife out for a nice dinner! ;-)

 

What you get

Sci-fi!  It'll make you think, and maybe open your eyes a little to the future coming at us.  There'll be about a dozen sci-fi stories (maybe 30,000 to 50,000 words total), plus an article from the editor (that's me!) about the future in the real world.

 

Risks & Challenges

No risks at all.  I'm receiving a number of good stories, and I have a half-dozen of my own stories ready to publish, though I only expect to put one of my own in issue #3.

 

Submitting a Story

If you'd like to submit a story, send it (as text in the body of the email, please!) to:

michael.s.alter.author@gmail.com

Rules for submission:

4,000 words of less (I'm not super-strict about that one)

PG-13 or tamer (a bit more strict on that account, but there is a gray area)

Has to be a work where you own all the rights

Science fiction, or maybe tales of the weird.  No swords and sorcery, please!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Post about the campaign on Twitter...

...or Facebook

...or any other social media platform

...or just tell your friends about it!

Thanks again for checking out our campaign!

story:
We believe that compelling, diverse farm journalism is needed now more than ever. We need your help!

Crop Stories is a biannual print publication that digs deep into relationships between farmer and field, consumer and market, soil and table. We launched in Athens, Georgia in 2014, and created three editions — blueberries, winter squash, and radishes — that employed narrative, history, and recipe to explore agriculture in the South.

It soon became evident that Crop Stories filled an untapped need for readers interested in our blend of agricultural food stories, photography, culinary coverage, and food advocacy. Crop Stories garnered regional and national attention from well-respected food platforms such as Tasting Table, Paste Magazine, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution, and the Charleston Post and Courier.

Launched as a labor of love by farmers and writers, Crop Stories' editorial team assessed its plan for the future and decided they wanted more. A bigger, better publication. To do so, we need help.

Our vision is to create a beautiful, tactile magazine experience that honors the great agricultural traditions and future of the American South, doing so with journalistic integrity, an artistic eye, and compelling stories told by diverse voices. Planned stories include a gritty travelogue from the Sweet Potato Capital of the World, narratives from past and present poultry plant workers, an agrarian guide to Alabama, an illustrated homage to George Washington Carver, and a personal journey exploring an African American family's connection to farmland in North Florida.

We aim to introduce our revamped Crop Stories in the fall of 2017.

To accomplish all this, we seek partners who share in our vision – organizations and individuals who believe in the power of the soil and the power of story. Your financial support will bolster our efforts to produce a visually compelling zine and share it with a wider audience. Supporting our mission will help Crop Stories grow and support a talented staff and its crew of freelance writers, illustrators, and photographers.

In total, we need $11,000. This amount will fund production, hire a designer, pay our freelancers a fair rate, and afford the editorial team a modest promotional budget.

story:
Who's the King?

Back Cover

"From the dawn of Creation...to the Pharaoh's of Egypt and on to the 'dot.com' world of the 21st century. From the humble existence of nomadic tribesmen, to the spoilt lives of the 'Super Elite'...Gripping...Intense and highly provocative, should you dare to venture into its depths, 'Who's the King' will not only challenge the very fabric of your existence, it may cause you to have a paradigm shift concerning the world in which you live."


Have you ever wondered: -

1. Why & how Life, Human Beings and the Universe came about?

2. Why 84% of our world's population identify with a faith or higher power?

3. Why there are so many different religious & spiritual beliefs?

4. Why Fear & Greed underpin the thought processes of most human beings?

5. Why Religion, Money, Politics & War dominate our landscape?

6. Why you're here? What's the purpose of your extremely short life span on earth?

If you've ever contemplated or sought answers for any of the above you've landed in the right place and 'Who's the King', while being an entertaining, revealing and compelling read, will introduce you to a plethora of controversial answers.  

The truth is definitely stranger than fiction, but remember, as you read on and your mind is stretched...

THOSE WHO SEEK THE TRUTH SHALL FIND IT!


Book Structure:

Author's Introduction

Prologue - 31 December 2029

Book 1: Genesis - Let the Games Begin

Book 2: Fear & Greed - Pillars of Control

Book 3: Final Conflict - There can be Only One

Epilogue: Keys to the Universe - You Determine the Relationship


IT'S A CRACKING READ & I BET YOU'LL AGREE - SO ORDER THE $5 PERK NOW ...THEN COME BACK, WITHIN CAMPAIGN TIME, TO SELECT THE OTHER PERKS OR TO MAKE A MOST WELCOME & APPRECIATED DONATION


What I Need


My book has been a 20 year journey and I need your help to take it from pen-strokes and ideas, to a fully fledged book that you can take with you and enjoy the ride as you uncover the answers to Who's The King? If you support me, I will spend the money on:

  • Working with a professional editor.
  • Organising the artwork.
  • Contracting a printer/publisher to ensure that you receive your book before Christmas this year.


What You Get


This book will hopefully stimulate you to change the way you think about your existence and the current status quo of day to day life. I hope it will set you on the path to true freedom, to be the person that you really want to be. I hope it will enlighten you as to the underlying rules that underpin our earthly flesh and blood existence. That being said, it's stated that when you understand the rules of the game, you can ALWAYS win the game. I hope It will improve your relationships with family, friends and colleagues, having opened up in you the ability to better relate to people on a deeper and more unconditional level. 

When people have read the book my hope is that the new personal truths that they unearth and develop will influence world consciousness more dramatically in the following ways:

  • Greater tolerance, forgiveness and unconditional love towards all living beings
  • Acceptance of the role of all humanity in protecting our environment
  • An understanding that each of us, individually and collectively, has the power to change the world for the better and that we must act NOW before nature and the universe step in and take charge.


Risks & Challenges


My plan is to deliver the finished book before Christmas this year. I have already written the material, but perhaps when I use a professional editor, it may take more time than expected.


    Other Ways You Can Help


    Q. I'm not a big reader and I am having trouble justifying why I should pre-purchase the book?

    A. Books, as with all stories, are the facilitators of imagination. They enable people to both understand and create in their own minds the reality that people would like to perceive and sometimes that is the starting point for revolutionary ideas...You could of course order the book and pass it on as a gift :)

    If you choose to simply donate, in order to make my novel possible, then perhaps we will change the world together step by step...Thank You

story:
Η 'μικροτρικυμία' είναι ένα βιβλίο για αναγνώστες από έντεκα χρονών και άνω.
διαδραματίζεται σε έναν ποοοολύ μακρινό πλανήτη και οποιαδήποτε ομοιότητα με την γη πραγματικά ...δεν είναι τυχαία !
πρωταγωνιστούν παγωτα, κέικ, συνεργατικά καφενεία, έφηβοι και το... 'διαδίκτυο'!
στο τέλος, η δικαιοσύνη απονέμεται αδρά και σας διαβεβαιώνουμε πως
κανένας εξωγήινος δεν απειλήθηκε κατά την διάρκεια της συγγραφής.

στόχος της καμπάνιας είναι να αυτο-εκδοθεί το παραμύθι. θα έχει σκληρό εξώφυλλο και 12 έγχρωμες εικόνες φιλοτεχνημένες από 3 νέους εικονογράφους. τα 12 πρωτότυπα τραγούδια που συνοδεύουν την ιστορία του μακρινού πλανήτη είναι διαθέσιμα σε υψηλής ποιότητας αρχεία μέσω του bandcamp.

αναλυτικά οι συντελεστές του εγχειρήματος είναι:

κείμενο, στίχοι, μουσική: σταμάτης διαμαντόπουλος

ενορχήστρωση, μουσική παραγωγή: σταμάτης διαμαντόπουλος, αλέξανδρος σαραφόπουλος       sound design: murphy

εικονογραφηση: χλόη φινν, λέλα στασινοπούλου, βαγγέλης μαντζαβίνος.

στις ηχογραφήσεις τραγουδούν οι: κατερίνα μήρτσιου, δάφνη παπαστράτη, δωροθέα μιχαήλ, βαλασία ντόντουλου, δημήτρης αθανασόπουλος, ευαγγελία χρηστίδη, αλέξανδρος σαραφόπουλος, αντώνης πασχούλας και στεφανία παπουτσή. κιθάρα έπαιξε ο θάνος μιττάκος. 

στον παρακάτω σύνδεσμο μπορείτε να ακούσετε τα τραγούδια του παραμυθιού, να δείτε όλες τις εικόνες και να συνεισφέρετε με όποιο ποσό θέλετε. τα έσοδα θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για την αυτοέκδοση!

https://neilsholgerson.bandcamp.com/album/meekrotreekeemeea

εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε το κείμενο:

https://neilsholgerson.wordpress.com/2016/02/08...
story_txt:
Η 'μικροτρικυμία' είναι ένα βιβλίο για αναγνώστες από έντεκα χρονών και άνω.διαδραματίζεται σε έναν ποοοολύ μακρινό πλανήτη και οποιαδήποτε ομοιότητα με την γη πραγματικά ...δεν είναι τυχαία ! πρωταγωνιστούν παγωτα, κέικ, συνεργατικά καφενεία, έφηβοι και το... 'διαδίκτυο'! στο τέλος, η δικαιοσύνη απονέμεται αδρά και σας διαβεβαιώνουμε πως κανένας εξωγήινος δεν απειλήθηκε κατά την διάρκεια της συγγραφής. στόχος της καμπάνιας είναι να αυτο-εκδοθεί το παραμύθι. θα έχει σκληρό εξώφυλλο και 12 έγχρωμες εικόνες φιλοτεχνημένες από 3 νέους εικονογράφους. τα 12 πρωτότυπα τραγούδια που συνοδεύουν την ιστορία του μακρινού πλανήτη είναι διαθέσιμα σε υψηλής ποιότητας αρχεία μέσω του bandcamp.

αναλυτικά οι συντελεστές του εγχειρήματος είναι: 



κείμενο, στίχοι, μουσική: σταμάτης διαμαντόπουλος
ενορχήστρωση, μουσική παραγωγή: σταμάτης διαμαντόπουλος, αλέξανδρος σαραφόπουλος       sound design: murphy
εικονογραφηση: χλόη φινν, λέλα στασινοπούλου, βαγγέλης μαντζαβίνος. 

στις ηχογραφήσεις τραγουδούν οι: κατερίνα μήρτσιου, δάφνη παπαστράτη, δωροθέα μιχαήλ, βαλασία ντόντουλου, δημήτρης αθανασόπουλος, ευαγγελία χρηστίδη, αλέξανδρος σαραφόπουλος, αντώνης πασχούλας και στεφανία παπουτσή. κιθάρα έπαιξε ο θάνος μιττάκος. 
στον παρακάτω σύνδεσμο μπορείτε να ακούσετε τα τραγούδια του παραμυθιού, να δείτε όλες τις εικόνες και να συνεισφέρετε με όποιο ποσό θέλετε. τα έσοδα θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για την αυτοέκδοση!
https://neilsholgerson.bandcamp.com/album/meekrotreekeemeea
εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε το κείμενο:

https://neilsholgerson.wordpress.com/2016/02/08...

story:
Short Summary

My name is Caleb Breedlove, I am a passionate writer and speaker that seeks to expand the kingdom of God by enriching the lives of its citizens. All of my books flow from a place dedicated to intercession and a heart to mobilize the church unto true discipleship. In 2012 the Lord directed me to write the first manuscript "Hidden Yet Majestic". Then in 2014 the Lord called me to dedicate 21 days of fasting to write the second manuscript "The Anatomy of Prayer". At the beginning of 2016, the Lord instructed me to fast for 3 days to write a message, the third manuscript "Unburdened". All three books is devoted to one vision: To edify, equip and encourage the functioning and arising generation of the church.

The Three Books, One Vision campaign is an invitation to further the process of making this vision a tangible reality. By your generous donations we will be able to complete the process of editing, formatting and publishing these manuscripts and witness this vision realized, not only in thought or theory, but in a touchable and imperishable way. 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's be transparent. This is the list of expenses that I will be needing to materialize this vision:

  • I am teaming with the amazing editorial services of Modern Day Wordsmith. Bethany Duarte, head editor, is going to take this project personally and her work is amazing. She has discounted the price for this magnitude of a project, which is the majority of the budget. Where it would easily be $5000-$6000, the performance of all services to get it publisher-ready is going to cost only $3,500. 
  • Christofer Hampton, an awesome graphics designer, has worked really hard with me over these last few years in crafting the cover art for these manuscripts. He is still in the process of adding the final touches but I've put the rough drafts up on Facebook  for you to see. The cost of his services are also discounted to only $500.
  • The next within the budget is going towards a new launching publishing company for young christian writers called Grey Oaks Publishing. The cost is $500.
  • And the last $1,000 will be going to paying Indiegogo for their marvelous services and the starting budget for printing. 
  • As a re-investment and material "Thank You" , we will be giving you exclusive access to the early-bird pre-sale of the materials at the LOWEST rate. You can be eligible for: a FREE subscription to our weekly podcast, a FREE e-book of one manuscript of choice, and for more see our perks column on the side!

The Impact

One thing our generation craves is authenticity and understanding. Within these three manuscripts is a consistent theme of being based on the Word of God  and having a deep intimacy with Him. Just as it has changed my life in the high-honor of writing these manuscripts, I have witnessed and know within my heart it will accomplish the same for the many others that will be able to read it through your donations. I believe these manuscripts are just the beginning of answering and encouraging the church today who are still questioning the development of our identities, pertinent disciplines of our faith and the messages that we hear in our pews today. 

Risks & Challenges

Though the vision is clear and has well-lined bookshelves from financial to marketing strategies, there are some challenges that we see and have quite the strategy to overcome. 

Challenge: We are over-saturated with knowledge. That alone is a reality that may seem too insurmountable. Strategy: However, we are still over-saturated with seekers of knowledge that hungers for something fresh, relatable, clear and to the point. These manuscripts are ready to speak to relevant issues, questions, and give understanding in a clear and precise manner.

Challenge: How will people know about the books, as you are a new author?Strategy: The goal isn't quick fame, it is sustained success. And the success we seek is to see the readers of these books, come into a closer, more vibrant and preserving faith and intimacy with Jesus. It will take time, but who knows what one testimony of a changed life can do!

Other Ways to Help

For those that are not able to contribute, this is how you can help:

  • Pray with us! 
  • GET THE WORD OUT! Share this everyday and every where! Use the Indiegogo share tools!
THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jeanette Holt.  I've been writing for a few years but just recently, I became a full time carer to my husband who has early onset dementia and I had to give up my career as a maths teacher. So now I get to write.  A lot.

It is more important to me now to get my work published and that's what I hope to achieve with this campaign.

With your help I can give this completed and edited novel a professional polish and all the marketing it deserves.  It is an original story with an important message about the families of those whose loved ones are missing.

What We Need & What You Get

I need £3,000.  This will cover all the costs for final proof reading, publishing in hard copy and marketing.  Any extra money which I raise will do the same for my next novel.  Every penny is for my writing.

Remember, my perks include copies of all three of my books, not just this one.  So, lots of reading material plus, of course, my profound thanks.

If I don't quite reach my funding target I will use whatever funds I have to get as close to my goals as possible.  It all helps.

The Impact

I'm very proud of this book.  It holds a different and important perspective on the tragedies experienced by those whose loved ones are missing.  We see dramatic shots of grieving families on news reports but there is a deeper story.  A story I want to release to the world.

Risks & Challenges

The book is already written and edited but without sufficient funding it won't make it further than an ebook.

I'm determined though and I believe what I have written deserves the effort.  I will of course add my own savings to the funding I receive and give it everything I have.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remember that Indiegogo has tools for sharing!

Thank you
